programme.title: Alerta aeropuerto: San Pablo
programme.desc: La policía revisa las pertenencias de una mujer de comportamiento singular, mientras lidian con sus problemas de salud. En la zona de registro de maletas, los agentes deben frenar la huida de un joven que viajaba a África.

programme.title: Alerta aeropuerto: San Pablo
programme.desc: La policía interviene a dos pasajeras sospechosas, mientras que en la zona de arribos internacionales, los oficiales deben lidiar con seis africanos tendidos en el suelo que, presos de un ataque de nervios, se niegan a cooperar.

programme.title: Alerta aeropuerto: San Pablo
programme.desc: El equipo de inteligencia se encarga de interceptar un envío de droga a Hong Kong, mientras los agentes migratorios investigan los verdaderos motivos de viaje de dos supuestos turistas indios.

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Madrid
programme.desc: Un pasajero pretende hacerles creer a los oficiales que él también es policía de Antinarcóticos y así esquivar el control de su equipaje. Además, el grupo de Extranjería mantiene un tenso enfrentamiento con un falsificador de documentos.

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Madrid
programme.desc: Un pasajero proveniente de Brasil despierta las sospechas de la policía al intentar evadir los controles de seguridad y los agentes deben encontrarlo antes de que haga conexión para revisar los contenidos de su maleta.

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Madrid
programme.desc: Un hombre y una mujer provenientes de Colombia harán una reveladora confesión a los oficiales, mientras dos pasajeros arribados de Dubái intentan esquivar los controles policiales.

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Madrid
programme.desc: Un pasajero pretende burlar a los policías de Antinarcóticos con un inusual método para esconder droga, aunque será otra la sorpresa que se lleven los agentes. El grupo de Extranjería debe encontrar a cuatro pasajeros que portan documentación falsa.

programme.title: Alerta aeropuerto: Lima
programme.desc: La policía deberá develar los verdaderos motivos para volar a Europa de dos pasajeros y atender el insistente pedido de una turista para que examinen su equipaje, mientras que una empleada tendrá que pedir ayuda por un exótico pasajero.

programme.title: Alerta aeropuerto: Lima
programme.desc: Gracias a los rayos X, los agentes detectan anomalías en una maleta destinada a un vuelo que está a punto de despegar. Mientras tanto, el calor pone en evidencia a dos pasajeros y deberán rendir explicaciones ante la policía antidrogas.

programme.title: Alerta aeropuerto: Lima
programme.desc: Los agentes deben interceptar a tres pasajeros sospechosos antes de que embarquen hacia el viejo continente mientras descubren qué esconde una mujer que intenta viajar a Madrid con una maleta que, asegura, ha sido adulterada.

programme.title: Alerta aeropuerto: San Pablo
programme.desc: El equipo de inteligencia de la Policia Federal ha detectado a dos pasajeros que podrían estar viajando con drogas, pero gracias a la labor de los oficiales, logran interceptar a cuatro sospechosos.

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Roma

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Roma
programme.desc: El Equipo Antidrogas sospecha de un hombre que afirma estar viajando por amor. Además, el equipo debe determinar si una pasajera búlgara es realmente quien dice ser y la Unidad Investigativa de Fronteras demora a un hombre iraní.

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Roma
programme.desc: La policía antidrogas intenta descubrir qué esconde un pasajero en sus zapatos. Las vacaciones de tres supuestos amigos se ven amenazadas. Los agentes antidrogas investigan a una pasajera que no hace más que rezar.

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Roma
programme.desc: La policía antidrogas debe descubrir qué lleva un gigoló italiano entre sus pantalones. Una pareja de albaneses descontrola la comisaría. Los agentes de seguridad deben descartar una alerta de explosivos.

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Lima
programme.desc: Los agentes detienen a un pasajero español al descubrir que cada elemento de sus maletas, desde ropa a productos alimenticios, lleva un inesperado contenido oculto: cocaína. El cargamento termina sumando casi 10 kilogramos.

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Lima

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis
programme.desc: La lucha de Hitler por los cielos obliga al Reich a adoptar una política de Guerra Total. El resultado es uno de los sistemas de defensa aérea más eficientes que el mundo haya visto.

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis
programme.desc: En mayo de 1940, la maquinaria de guerra nazi llega al canal de la Mancha. Hitler planea destruir la fuerza aérea británica y llevar tropas al sur de Inglaterra.

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis
programme.desc: Guadalcanal es la perla del Pacífico y Japón está decidido a construir un campo de aviación allí. Sin embargo, EE. UU. también está interesado en él. El país que controle Guadalcanal ganará potencialmente la Segunda Guerra Mundial.

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis
programme.desc: En 1942, Japón invadió Birmania y ordenó la construcción de un ferrocarril para garantizar la llegada de suministros. La obra empleó a 200 000 prisioneros de guerra, a los que se obligó a montar una vía de 415 kilómetros de longitud.

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis
programme.desc: Durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, Adolf Hitler encomendó al general Erwin Rommel derrotar a los Aliados en Túnez, Libia y Egipto. Las duras condiciones del terreno y el genio militar de Rommel pusieron a los británicos al límite de su resistencia.

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis
programme.desc: Durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, un grupo de espías de los Aliados pusieron documentos falsos junto a un cadáver. Esto logró que la invasión de Sicilia sorprendiera a las fuerzas nazis.

programme.title: Megaestructuras nazis: La guerra rusa
programme.desc: La historia de cómo Hitler invadió Rusia, de la mayor fuerza invasora jamás reunida en la historia militar y de la historia menos conocida del asedio de Sebastopol, en el Mar Negro.

programme.title: Megaestructuras nazis: La guerra rusa
programme.desc: Tras una humillante derrota en Stalingrado, Adolf Hitler decide llevar a cabo una Guerra Total antes de dar comienzo a la mayor batalla de tanques de la historia.

programme.title: Megaestructuras nazis: La guerra rusa
programme.desc: La historia de la retirada nazi del Báltico al corazón de Berlín.

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis
programme.desc: Las vías férreas fueron el alma y la sangre del imperio de la Alemania nazi, empleadas para difundir la ambición y poder. Este programa revelará el tren personal de Hitler, búnkeres jamás vistos, y el papel siniestro de los trenes nazis.

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis
programme.desc: Los Aliados pensaron que un avance desde el sur podría derrotar a los nazis, pero se equivocaron. Descubrir la estrategia que llevó a Hitler a desplegar una línea defensiva por toda la península italiana.

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis
programme.desc: Este show destapa la guerra de Hitler, mientras presenta la Luftwaffe, una revolucionaria fuerza aérea alemana, creada a partir de la nada y apresurada por Hitler para aniquilar al enemigo desde el cielo.

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis
programme.desc: Hitler y la maquinaria de propaganda fueron clave en el lavado de cerebro de una nación. Este episodio investigará la evidencia dejada por los nazis, liderados por el genio siniestro del control mental: el Dr. Joseph Goebbels.

programme.title: Megaestructuras Nazis

programme.title: Megaestructuras nazis

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll
programme.desc: As the quest to the witch's castle begins, the group must pass through the ominous Swamp of Fears, where one's worst terrors are unleashed; Brendar is surprised to come face to face with anxiety that will test her leadership.

programme.title: The Quarry
programme.desc: After murdering a traveling preacher, a fugitive drifter assumes his identity and becomes the new cleric of a small-town church. While he wins over the congregation, the police chief starts to link the mysterious stranger to a crime investigation.

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: Steven Russell (Jim Carrey) becomes a cop, gets married and starts a family, but after a terrible car accident, he vows to be true to himself. He comes out of the closet, moves to Florida, and finances a luxurious lifestyle with bad checks and credit cards. In prison, Steven meets Phillip (Ewan McGregor), a mild-mannered inmate who becomes the love of his life. Determined to build a beautiful life with his lover, Steven embarks on another crime spree.

programme.title: Bright Lights, Big City
programme.desc: In this adaptation of Jay McInerney's novel, Jamie Conway (Michael J. Fox) moves from small-town Kansas to New York City to work at a magazine. However, a number of things are making him miserable: He would rather be a writer, his wife (Phoebe Cates) has left him and his mother (Dianne Wiest) has recently died. So he takes to partying with his yuppie friend Tad (Kiefer Sutherland), abusing alcohol and cocaine. But he quickly finds himself becoming more and more dependent on drinking and drugs.

programme.title: For Greater Glory: The True Story of Cristiada
programme.desc: In late 1920s Mexico, retired Gen. Gorostieta (Andy Garcia) and his wife (Eva Longoria) watch their country degenerate into violent civil war when the government enacts a series of anti-clerical laws. Gorostieta is at first hesitant to join the rebels, known as Cristeros, until he begins to see the cost of religious persecution on his countrymen. Though the odds are against him, the general nevertheless transforms a ragtag band of rebels into a formidable fighting force.

programme.title: Anna to the Infinite Power
programme.desc: A child prodigy (Martha Byrne) learns she is part of a secret experiment in genetic engineering.

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: The rise of country music legend Johnny Cash (Joaquin Phoenix) begins with his days as a boy growing up on the family farm, where he struggles under the scorn of his father (Robert Patrick). As the years pass, Cash ends up in Memphis, Tenn., with his wife, Vivian (Ginnifer Goodwin), and breaks into the music scene after finding his trademark sound. While on tour, Cash meets the love of his life, singer June Carter (Reese Witherspoon), but Cash's volatile lifestyle threatens to keep them apart.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: El Norte
programme.desc: When a group of Mayan Indians decides to organize a labor union to improve conditions in their village, their community is violently destroyed by the Guatemalan army. Teenage siblings, Rosa (Zaide Silvia Gutiérrez) and Enrique (David Villalpando) manage to escape the massacre and decide to start a new life in El Norte -- the USA. The two trek through Mexico, meeting a variety of characters and facing trials and tribulations on their journey toward lives as illegal immigrants in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Almost Heroes
programme.desc: Two explorers are racing Lewis and Clark to the Pacific Ocean in 1804. Edwards (Matthew Perry) is a glory-seeking fop who's out of his league, Hunt (Chris Farley) is a slovenly, clumsy tracker with a soft spot for toilet humor. Along with a team of misfits and losers, the duo wreaks havoc on the American frontier.

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent (Martin Freeman) is trying to prevent his house from being bulldozed when his friend Ford Prefect (Mos Def) whisks him into outer space. It turns out Ford is an alien who has just saved Arthur from Earth's total annihilation. Ford introduces Arthur to his myriad friends, including many-headed President Zaphod Beeblebrox (Sam Rockwell) and sexy refugee Trillian (Zooey Deschanel). Arthur makes his way across the stars while seeking the meaning of life, or something close to it.

programme.title: Twelve Monkeys
programme.desc: Traveling back in time isn't simple, as James Cole (Bruce Willis) learns the hard way. Imprisoned in the 2030s, James is recruited for a mission that will send him back to the 1990s. Once there, he's supposed to gather information about a nascent plague that's about to exterminate the vast majority of the world's population. But, aside from the manic Jeffrey (Brad Pitt), he gets little in the way of cooperation, not least from medical gatekeepers like Dr. Kathryn Railly (Madeleine Stowe).

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Some British retirees (Judi Dench, Maggie Smith, Bill Nighy) decide to outsource their retirement to exotic -- and less expensive -- India. Lured by advertisements for the newly restored Marigold Hotel and imagining a life of leisure in lush surroundings, they arrive and find that the Marigold is actually a shell of its former self. Though their new home is not quite what they had imagined, the retirees find that life and love can begin again when they let go of their pasts.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Thirty years ago, Clifford McBride led a voyage into deep space, but the ship and crew were never heard from again. Now his son -- a fearless astronaut -- must embark on a daring mission to Neptune to uncover the truth about his missing father and a mysterious power surge that threatens the stability of the universe.

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: Jack Cunningham was a high school basketball superstar who suddenly walked away from the game for unknown reasons. Years later, he's now stuck in a meaningless job and struggling with alcoholism -- the very thing that ruined his marriage and his hope for a better life. But Jack soon gets a shot at redemption when he becomes the basketball coach for his alma mater, a program that has fallen on hard times since his teenage glory days.

programme.title: Gamer
programme.desc: Each week Kable (Gerard Butler), a death-row inmate, battles his fellow prisoners in a violent online game called "Slayers," his every move controlled by a young gamer's remote device. To the players, Kable and the other inmates are just simulated characters. But, to a resistance group that opposes the game's inventor, Kable is a critical component of their plan to end the inventor's form of high-tech slavery.

programme.title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: In this third sequel to "Planet of the Apes," the apes turn the tables on the human Earth population when they lead a revolt against their cruel masters in the distant year of 1990. By doing this it creates the time loop that leads to the first film. "Conquest of the Planet of the Apes" is cinematically etched in broad, brash strokes slashing social satire and science fiction suspense with large-scale spectacle.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Every school day, African-American teenagers William Gates and Arthur Agee travel 90 minutes each way from inner-city Chicago to St. Joseph High School in Westchester, Illinois, a predominately white suburban school well-known for the excellence of its basketball program. Gates and Agee dream of NBA stardom, and with the support of their close-knit families, they battle the social and physical obstacles that stand in their way. This acclaimed documentary was shot over the course of five years.

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, siblings Ellie (Christina Ricci) and Jimmy (Jesse Eisenberg) come across an accident on Mulholland Drive. As they try to help the woman caught in the wreckage, a ferocious creature attacks them, devouring the woman and scratching the terrified siblings. They slowly discover that the creature was a werewolf and that they have fallen victim to a deadly curse. Now that they have been sliced by the werewolf's claws, they will be transformed into werewolves themselves.

programme.title: The Return of the Living Dead
programme.desc: When foreman Frank (James Karen) shows new employee Freddy (Thom Mathews) a secret military experiment in a supply warehouse, the two klutzes accidentally release a gas that reanimates corpses into flesh-eating zombies. As the epidemic spreads throughout Louisville, Ky., and the creatures satisfy their hunger in gory and outlandish ways, Frank and Freddy fight to survive with the help of their boss (Clu Gulager) and a mysterious mortician (Don Calfa).

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A professional assassin known only as Agent 47 (Timothy Olyphant) gets caught up in a dangerous political takeover. He flees across Eastern Europe, hoping to find out who set him up and why. However, his growing attachment to a beautiful but traumatized young woman poses as great a threat to his survival as that of the Interpol and Russian agents who are hunting him down.

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: A year after his heroics in L.A, detective John McClane (Bruce Willis) is mixed up in another terrorist plot, this time at Washington Dulles International Airport, where he is waiting for his wife (Bonnie Bedelia). That same night, South American politico and drug profiteer Ramon Esperanza (Franco Nero) is arriving in U.S. custody. McClane takes action when a treasonous ex-colonel (William Sadler) seizes control of the airport, threatening to crash every inbound flight unless Esperanza is freed.

programme.title: Chasing Mavericks
programme.desc: When 15-year-old surfing phenomenon Jay Moriarty (Jonny Weston) discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, actually exists near his California home, he becomes determined to conquer it. Jay enlists the aid of local surfing legend Frosty Hesson (Gerard Butler) to train him to ride the Mavericks and live to tell about it. As Jay and Frosty carry on their quest to achieve the impossible, they develop a unique friendship that transforms both their lives.

programme.title: Hitchcock
programme.desc: Following his great success with "North by Northwest," director Alfred Hitchcock (Anthony Hopkins) makes a daring choice for his next project: an adaptation of Robert Bloch's novel "Psycho." When the studio refuses to back the picture, Hitchcock decides to pay for it himself in exchange for a percentage of the profits. His wife, Alma Reville (Helen Mirren), has serious reservations about the film but supports him nonetheless. Still, the production strains the couple's marriage.

programme.title: Belly
programme.desc: Ever since they were kids, Sincere (Nas) and Buns (DMX) have lived life close to the edge, doing whatever it takes to survive. As adults, they build up their kingdom of crime on drug dealing and robbery. But Sincere grows weary of the criminal lifestyle and joins a black Muslim religious group. Buns, on the other hand, sinks deeper into criminality and faces serious prison time. The cops offer him a deal, however -- assassinate the head of the Muslim group, and he will go free.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: After one of his hostage negotiations goes awry, LAPD officer Jeff Talley (Bruce Willis) quits the force and relocates his family to the suburbs. As the sheriff in a sleepy town, Jeff thinks he has escaped the hustle and bustle -- until an elaborate local heist puts him back in the center of a hostage situation. When his own family is pulled into the fray, Jeff is forced to decide whether he should try to help the hostages or follow the criminals' hands-off mandate to protect his own family.

programme.title: Her Smell
programme.desc: Becky Something is a talented but self-destructive musician who seems determined to alienate everyone around her -- even at the cost of her own band's success.

programme.title: Killerman
programme.desc: Moe Diamond is a New York City money launderer who wakes up with no memory and millions of dollars in stolen cash and drugs. He must soon scour the streets in search of answers while trying to dodge a crew of violent and crooked cops.

programme.title: In Secret
programme.desc: A woman (Elizabeth Olsen) and her lover (Oscar Isaac) conspire to murder her mild-mannered husband (Tom Felton), but overwhelming guilt soon turns their passion into hatred.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Born under unusual circumstances, Benjamin Button (Brad Pitt) springs into being as an elderly man in a New Orleans nursing home and ages in reverse. Twelve years after his birth, he meets Daisy, a child who flickers in and out of his life as she grows up to be a dancer (Cate Blanchett). Though he has all sorts of unusual adventures over the course of his life, it is his relationship with Daisy, and the hope that they will come together at the right time, that drives Benjamin forward.

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: "Battle for the Planet of the Apes" is the final chapter in the sci-fi movie series. In this chapter, a tribute of human atomic bomb mutations are out to make life miserable for the peaceful ape tribe. The story is told primarily in flashback with the opening and closing taking place in the year 2670.

programme.title: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: The second installment in "The Planet of the Apes" series. Here, an earthling sent to find the astronauts of the original film discovers not only a world of intelligent, talking apes, but an underground cult of grotesque "humans" who are the survivors of a nuclear blast years ago.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the Greek myth, Hercules (Lou Ferrigno) -- a semi-divine being -- squares off against King Minos (William Berger), who is attempting to use science to gain power and take over the world. With the help of a benevolent sorceress, Circe (Mirella D'Angelo), Hercules tries to save his beloved Cassiopeia (Ingrid Anderson) from being sacrificed by Minos, and struggles against laser-breathing creatures and an evil sorceress (Sybil Danning).

programme.title: Boys and Girls
programme.desc: Ryan and Jennifer are opposites who definitely do not attract. At least that's what they always believed. When they met as twelve-year-olds, they disliked one another. When they met again as teenagers, they loathed each other. But when they meet in college, the uptight Ryan and the free-spirited Jennifer find that their differences bind them together and a rare friendship develops.

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: Young Bruce Lee is trying to make a name for himself while working as a martial arts instructor in 1964 San Francisco. When Lee meets Wong Jack Man, he challenges the kung fu master to a no-holds-barred fight that became the stuff of legend.

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: After Paul Duncan (Greg Kinnear) and his wife, Jessie (Rebecca Romijn-Stamos), lose their young son, Adam (Cameron Bright), in an accident, they are approached by Richard Wells (Robert De Niro), a fertility doctor. Wells believes that he can clone Adam and gives Paul and Jessie the option to let him try, but only if they start life over elsewhere. Adam's clone proves to be identical to the deceased boy, but, when he reaches his 8th birthday, things begin to go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Get Over It
programme.desc: A comic look at a romantic problem that has plagued mankind since the very first boy-girl breakup: how's a guy supposed to survive in a world where ex-girlfriends continue to exist ... and attract? When Berke (Ben Foster) and Allison (Melissa Sagemiller) break up he has a hard time dealing with her dating the new hot guy in school.

programme.title: Sound of My Voice
programme.desc: California couple Peter (Christopher Denham) and Lorna (Nicole Vicius) set out to make a documentary meant to expose a charismatic cult leader named Maggie (Brit Marling) as a fraud. Maggie claims to be from the year 2054 and is seemingly allergic to almost everything in her environment; she lives in a basement, subsisting on canned oxygen, homegrown food and the blood of her acolytes. Though at first, Peter and Lorna are adamant that Maggie is a fake, they both soon fall under her spell.

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: Grace (Nicole Kidman), the devoutly religious mother of Anne (Alakina Mann) and Nicholas (James Bentley), moves her family to the English coast during World War II. She awaits word on her missing husband while protecting her children from a rare photosensitivity disease that causes the sun to harm them. Anne claims she sees ghosts, Grace initially thinks the new servants are playing tricks but chilling events and visions make her believe something supernatural has occurred.

programme.title: Down to You
programme.desc: College coeds in New York City, Al (Freddie Prinze Jr.), the son of a celebrity chef (Henry Winkler), and Imogen (Julia Stiles), a talented artist, become smitten the second they lay eyes on one another at a bar. However, the road to happiness is not a smooth one. Outside forces, including a predatory porn star (Selma Blair) who wants to lure Al into her bed, threaten to pull apart the young lovers before their romance has a chance to really flourish.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: In the summer of 1999, four small-town Michigan boys began a quest to lose their virginity. In the ensuing years, Jim (Jason Biggs) has married Michelle (Alyson Hannigan), though Kevin (Thomas Ian Nicholas) has left Vicky (Tara Reid). Oz (Chris Klein) has grown apart from Heather (Mena Suvari), but Finch still has the hots for Stiffler's (Seann William Scott) mom (Jennifer Coolidge). These lifelong friends have come home to reminisce about -- and become inspired by -- their former teen selves.

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: The people of Detroit know 8 Mile as the city limit, a border, a boundary. It is also a psychological dividing line that separates Jimmy Smith Jr. (Eminem) from where and who he wants to be. A provocative fictional examination of a critical week in Jimmy's life.

programme.title: Rounders
programme.desc: Mike McDermott (Matt Damon) loses his money in a poker game against Russian gangster Teddy "KGB" (John Malkovich). Under pressure from his girlfriend, Jo (Gretchen Mol), he promises to quit gambling. This lasts until his friend, Lester "Worm" Murphy (Edward Norton), gets out of prison and needs to pay off an old debt. The pair come close to earning the money back but are caught cheating. Then Mike finds out the debt is owed to Teddy and makes one last-ditch effort to beat the Russian.

programme.title: Talk to Me
programme.desc: Outspoken ex-convict Ralph "Petey" Greene (Don Cheadle) talks his way onto the air at a white-owned radio station in 1960s Washington, D.C. Fueled by the new music and social upheaval of the times, he courts controversy while becoming the voice of the black movement.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Director Tim Burton ("Batman") reinvents one of the most acclaimed and beloved works of science fiction, Pierre Boulle's classic novel "Planet of the Apes." Burton's "Planet of the Apes" begins with the famed original's premise -- a pilot finds himself in a world turned upside down after landing on a strange planet.

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent (Martin Freeman) is trying to prevent his house from being bulldozed when his friend Ford Prefect (Mos Def) whisks him into outer space. It turns out Ford is an alien who has just saved Arthur from Earth's total annihilation. Ford introduces Arthur to his myriad friends, including many-headed President Zaphod Beeblebrox (Sam Rockwell) and sexy refugee Trillian (Zooey Deschanel). Arthur makes his way across the stars while seeking the meaning of life, or something close to it.

programme.title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
programme.desc: It's 1939 and governess Guinevere Pettigrew finds herself out of work and on the bread line. Middle-aged and running out of options, Miss Pettigrew takes an uncharacteristic gamble when, after being refused work at an employment agency,she steals the details of a juicy assignment and pursues the job herself.

programme.title: Luv
programme.desc: Accompanied by his young nephew (Michael Rainey Jr.), an ex-convict (Common) tries to raise money through a drug deal.

programme.title: Phantoms
programme.desc: The resort town of Snowfield, Colo., is under attack by an evil spirit that almost wipes out the entire population, possessing a number of those it kills. As the locals continue to fall victim to the demonic presence, it's up to Sheriff Bryce Hammond (Ben Affleck) to lead the response. He's helped by FBI-employed academic Dr. Timothy Flyte (Peter O'Toole), Deputy Stu Wargle (Liev Schreiber), local doctor Jennifer Pailey (Joanna Going) and her visiting sister, Lisa (Rose McGowan).

programme.title: For Greater Glory: The True Story of Cristiada
programme.desc: In late 1920s Mexico, retired Gen. Gorostieta (Andy Garcia) and his wife (Eva Longoria) watch their country degenerate into violent civil war when the government enacts a series of anti-clerical laws. Gorostieta is at first hesitant to join the rebels, known as Cristeros, until he begins to see the cost of religious persecution on his countrymen. Though the odds are against him, the general nevertheless transforms a ragtag band of rebels into a formidable fighting force.

programme.title: Moonlight Mile
programme.desc: When Joe Nast's (Jake Gyllenhaal) plans for marriage change due to an unexpected loss, he wants to be the man he believes everyone wants him to be - dutifully bereaved husband-to-be, and perfect would-be son-in-law to Ben (Dustin Hoffman) and JoJo (Susan Sarandon). But when another woman unexpectedly enters his life, he's quickly torn between fulfilling his new role and following his heart.

programme.title: Cake
programme.desc: After having visions of a member of her support group who killed herself, a woman (Jennifer Aniston) who also suffers with chronic pain seeks out the widower (Sam Worthington) of the suicide.

programme.title: The Fighter
programme.desc: For Micky Ward (Mark Wahlberg), boxing is a family affair. His tough-as-nails mother is his manager. His half-brother, Dicky (Christian Bale), once a promising boxer himself, is his very unreliable trainer. Despite Micky's hard work, he is losing and, when the latest fight nearly kills him, he follows his girlfriend's advice and splits from the family. Then Micky becomes a contender for the world title and he -- and his family -- earns a shot at redemption.

programme.title: On the Run
programme.desc: The beautiful coastline of Ecuador serves as a backdrop for a manhunt; the race starts in Cojimies and finishes near the village of La Mancha.

programme.title: The Xtreme CollXtion
programme.desc: A weekly magazine programme uniting the very best action and extreme sports from around the world.

programme.title: Dispatches
programme.desc: In today's episode, we meet legendary youtuber and surfer Ben Gravy. Next, we head to Minnesota to meet a woman fit to conquer one of the toughest races in endurance sports. Last, we join Paul Basagoitic as he rekindles his love for mountain biking.

programme.title: Boundless
programme.desc: Simon and Turbo face illness and exhaustion as they attempt to complete the 4 Deserts Sahara Race, a 155-mile trek through the deserts of Egypt.

programme.title: Facing Waves

programme.desc: The Rolex Middle Sea race, a race which traditionally heralds the conclusion of the Mediterranean offshore season, commences and concludes in historic Valetta.

programme.desc: Graham Jarvis battles for first after being disqualified the past three races. The Super Bowl of slope-style mountain biking, the Red Bull Joy Ride begins. Pro kayaker Ben Brown searches for the best rapids after a challenging recovery.

programme.title: Kapp to Cape
programme.desc: Reza Pakravan and Steven Pawley quit their secure jobs as a financial analysts in London. Attempting to set the World Record for the Fastest Bicycle Journey from Nordkapp to Cape Town in South Africa in an ambitious 100 days.

programme.title: Kapp to Cape
programme.desc: Reza and Steven build up tension as they start to fall behind on their journey. The police escort gives them trouble, forcing them to go through some of the most dangerous parts of Egypt without any protection.

programme.title: In the Zone

programme.title: Boundless

programme.title: Pushing the Limits
programme.desc: Thierry brings the same riders from the previous year to ride the same spot but this time in even bigger epic condition. But the specter of a bad fall leaves 2 time Free ride world Tour Champion Loic Collong Patton and the rest of the team uneasy.

programme.desc: A bar owner's adult grandchildren use it as their own personal playground.

programme.desc: Jon Taffer attempts to resuscitate Downey's, a failing Irish pub in Philadelphia.

programme.desc: Jon arrives at Bottoms Up to discover a staff running wild, a manager lacking courage to control his staff, and an owner ready to sell her bar.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Alan feels reluctant to make a commitment to Lyndsey, but an unexpected source inspires him; Walden enjoys being the boy-toy of a wealthy older woman.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: When Judith's pipes burst after an earthquake, Alan invites her to stay with him at Charlie's house.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Evelyn takes drastic measures to get back into her sons' lives after Alan cuts her off.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie tries to distract Alan from an upcoming medical procedure by planning a trip to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Judith leaves Jake with Alan and Charlie while she spends a week in Hawaii, and the guys find that caring for Jake on a daily basis is much different from weekend visits.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Slow-witted Forrest Gump (Tom Hanks) has never thought of himself as disadvantaged, and thanks to his supportive mother (Sally Field), he leads anything but a restricted life. Whether dominating on the gridiron as a college football star, fighting in Vietnam or captaining a shrimp boat, Forrest inspires people with his childlike optimism. But one person Forrest cares about most may be the most difficult to save -- his childhood love, the sweet but troubled Jenny (Robin Wright).

programme.title: João Kléber Show

programme.title: Mega Senha
programme.desc: Acompanhe esse teste de conhecimento, raciocínio rápido e trabalho em equipe. Dois times, cada um formado por uma celebridade e um participante, competem numa divertida e emocionante disputa para mostrar quem tem o melhor vocabulário. Na primeira etapa do jogo - composto de quatro rodadas eliminatórias - um dos membros da dupla dá dicas para que o outro descubra qual é a palavra secreta (a mega senha) daquela rodada. O participante que acertar o maior número de palavras ao final das rodadas eliminatórias passa para a etapa seguinte. A segunda etapa do jogo consiste de seis rodadas, nas quais a dupla precisa acertar cinco mega senhas em um minuto e meio. A cada rodada, o desafio fica maior, já que o número de mega senhas vai diminuindo. Se no primeiro round o time precisa acertar cinco mega senhas dentre dez disponíveis, no sexto e último round - valendo o prêmio máximo do programa - são apenas cinco palavras disponíveis e todas tem que ser adivinhadas corretamente.

programme.desc: Apresentado pelo renomado jurista e professor emérito da Universidade Mackenzie, Dr. Ives Gandra Martins, o programa "Anatomia do Poder", veiculado pela Rede Viva, de fato "disseca" o poder através de entrevistas com as personalidades mais respeitadas vinculadas a instituições públicas e privadas. O telespectador tem a oportunidade de ficar por dentro de alguns problemas concretos da atualidade, que são analisados de forma simples e verdadeira.

programme.title: Motivação e Sucesso
programme.desc: O Professor Luiz Marins, empresário bem-sucedido em vários ramos, responde perguntas sobre sucesso profissional, pessoal e empresarial.

programme.title: Acima de Tudo o Amor
programme.desc: Junto com seus diretores espirituais, os padres Fernando Tadeu e Túlio Gambarato, Henrique Prata discute como é possível fazer com que uma gestão pública funcione com excelência e beneficie aqueles que mais precisam.

programme.title: Juntos pela Fé
programme.desc: O compromisso de trazer sempre uma história e um grande acontecimento diferente.

programme.title: RedeVida Visita
programme.desc: Os encantos e belezas de várias localidades do Brasil e também de outros países, além de personalidades de expressão no cenário mundial. O telespectador passeia pelos lugares conhecendo as pessoas, a culinária e toda a diversidade cultural do local.

programme.desc: Abençoando o dia do telespectador, Padre Marcelo Rossi reza com o público pela saúde, pelo trabalho, pela fé e pela família brasileira quatro vezes por dia.

programme.desc: Acompanhe reflexões e matérias sobre o trabalho feito pela Igreja para pessoas carentes.

programme.title: Escolhas da Vida
programme.desc: Para aquelas pessoas que vivem com pressa, se sentem aflitas com as notícias trágicas que dominam o mundo, para quem não sabe qual caminho escolher ou simplesmente está em busca de paz interior, Dalcides Biscalquim apresenta este programa de reflexão, histórias de vida, aconselhamento e espiritualidade. Curta um momento realmente especial. Aqui, o telespectador tem um canal aberto para conversar com o apresentador, por meio de e-mail ou telefone. Quem quiser participar pode enviar sua história à emissora.

programme.title: Rosário da Vida
programme.desc: A REDEVIDA e o Padre Juarez de Castro querem convidar os telespectadores para oferecer diariamente uma rosa para Maria ao participarem do Rosário da Vida. O Rosário é a forma mais bonita de homenagem à Maria e é um dos meios de salvação mais poderosos e eficazes que nos é oferecido pela Divina Providência contra o mal, além de ser a oração mais apreciada por Nossa Senhora. São rosas feitas de oração, de afeto, de pedido e de súplica. Com ele, vamos coroar a Mãe de Jesus, depositando em suas mãos e cobrindo seus pés.

programme.title: Jornal da Vida
programme.desc: O Jornal da Vida apresenta para a sociedade a boa notícia e a informação, acompanhada de esperança e soluções. Especialistas de diversos setores e correspondentes do jornal estão por todo o país, transmitindo as notícias mais importantes do Brasil e do mundo. O programa aborda temas como esporte, política e economia, não se concentrando apenas em informações relacionadas à Igreja Católica. O telejornal é apresentado por Luiz Antônio Monteiro de Barros e foi ao ar pela primeira vez no dia 5 de Janeiro de 2009, numa edição especial de estreia.

programme.desc: Para aquelas pessoas que vivem com pressa, se sentem aflitas com as notícias trágicas que dominam o mundo, para quem não sabe qual caminho escolher ou simplesmente está em busca de paz interior, Dalcides Biscalquim apresenta este programa de reflexão, histórias de vida, aconselhamento e espiritualidade. Curta um momento realmente especial. Aqui, o telespectador tem um canal aberto para conversar com o apresentador, por meio de e-mail ou telefone. Quem quiser participar pode enviar sua história à emissora.

programme.title: Rosário da Vida
programme.desc: A REDEVIDA e o Padre Juarez de Castro querem convidar os telespectadores para oferecer diariamente uma rosa para Maria ao participarem do Rosário da Vida. O Rosário é a forma mais bonita de homenagem à Maria e é um dos meios de salvação mais poderosos e eficazes que nos é oferecido pela Divina Providência contra o mal, além de ser a oração mais apreciada por Nossa Senhora. São rosas feitas de oração, de afeto, de pedido e de súplica. Com ele, vamos coroar a Mãe de Jesus, depositando em suas mãos e cobrindo seus pés.

programme.title: Frente a Frente

programme.title: Jornal da Vida
programme.desc: O Jornal da Vida apresenta para a sociedade a boa notícia e a informação, acompanhada de esperança e soluções. Especialistas de diversos setores e correspondentes do jornal estão por todo o país, transmitindo as notícias mais importantes do Brasil e do mundo. O programa aborda temas como esporte, política e economia, não se concentrando apenas em informações relacionadas à Igreja Católica. O telejornal é apresentado por Luiz Antônio Monteiro de Barros e foi ao ar pela primeira vez no dia 5 de Janeiro de 2009, numa edição especial de estreia.

programme.title: Acusado: Culpado ou Inocente?
programme.desc: Um relato intimista sobre o que acontece quando um indivíduo é acusado e julgado por um crime, contado pela perspectiva do réu, de seu time de advogados, e seus familiares, passando pelo processo de planejamento legal, até o julgamento.

programme.title: Poder em Foco
programme.desc: Paulo Caffarelli, presidente da Cielo, fala de novas formas de pagamento como Pix e WhatsApp. Ele também conversa sobre os avanços tecnológicos no sistema financeiro e o futuro do setor bancário. Caffarelli detalha o projeto piloto realizado pela Cielo, que permite o pagamento de contas apenas pela identificação facial.

programme.title: O Crime Não Compensa
programme.desc: Os crimes passionais mais chocantes do país são recriados por psicólogos, psiquiatras, promotores e investigadores. Veja também depoimentos das famílias das vítimas e dos acusados.

programme.title: Primeiro Impacto
programme.desc: Acompanhe as reportagens que trazem informações do dia a dia. Saiba o que é relevante para o cenário cotidiano através de análises e opiniões de colunistas.

programme.title: Bom Dia & Cia

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam e Cat se conhecem e se tornam amigas quando Sam se muda para Los Angeles. Elas logo começam um serviço de babá, o que as leva a muitas aventuras divertidas e malucas.

programme.title: Fofocalizando
programme.desc: Revista eletrônica com informação, humor e as principais fofocas do mundo dos famosos.

programme.desc: Conflitos que acontecem entre parentes, vizinhos e até no ambiente de trabalho são abordados e resolvidos diante de uma plateia, com uma psicóloga como supervisora.

programme.title: Triunfo do Amor
programme.desc: Um jovem casal deve lutar contra um passado que não lhes pertence e um presente que os ameaça, um mundo que parece perfeito, mas onde existe o mal e os segredos mais comoventes.

programme.title: Amores Verdadeiros
programme.desc: Victoria Balvanera é uma importante empresária que após ser vítima de um atentado, decide contratar o segurança particular Francisco Guzmán para sua filha, Nikki Briz. A partir de então, a história coloca a prova o que é um amor verdadeiro.

programme.title: SBT Brasil
programme.desc: Acompanhe as principais notícias do Brasil e do mundo com análise profunda dos fatos.

programme.title: Roda a Roda Jequiti
programme.desc: O programa Roda a Roda Jequiti possibilita aos participantes concorrerem a prêmios em barras de ouro. Até hoje, já foram pagos muitos milhões em prêmios aos consultores e clientes que foram sorteados para a atração. A pessoa que comprar um produto Jequiti ganha um cupom para participar do programa, que deve ser preenchido e entregue a um consultor Jequiti. Se for sorteado, ele e seu consultor irão a São Paulo com tudo pago para participar do programa.

programme.title: Chiquititas - Edição Especial
programme.desc: Fundado por um empresário com motivos misteriosos, o orfanato Raio de Luz é a casa de Mili e várias outras crianças que enfrentam juntas os desafios da vida.

programme.desc: Veja uma mesa redonda sobre futebol, com foco na semana dos clubes.

programme.title: Chiquititas - Edição Especial

programme.title: Pra Ganhar É Só Rodar

programme.title: Poder em Foco
programme.desc: Paulo Caffarelli, presidente da Cielo, fala de novas formas de pagamento como Pix e WhatsApp. Ele também conversa sobre os avanços tecnológicos no sistema financeiro e o futuro do setor bancário. Caffarelli detalha o projeto piloto realizado pela Cielo, que permite o pagamento de contas apenas pela identificação facial.

Até hoje, já foram pagos muitos milhões em prêmios aos consultores e clientes que foram sorteados para a atração. A pessoa que comprar um produto Jequiti ganha um cupom para participar do programa, que deve ser preenchido e entregue a um consultor Jequiti. Se for sorteado, ele e seu consultor irão a São Paulo com tudo pago para participar do programa.

programme.title: Acusado: Culpado ou Inocente?
programme.desc: Um relato intimista sobre o que acontece quando um indivíduo é acusado e julgado por um crime, contado pela perspectiva do réu, de seu time de advogados, e seus familiares, passando pelo processo de planejamento legal, até o julgamento.

programme.title: Poder em Foco
programme.desc: Paulo Caffarelli, presidente da Cielo, fala de novas formas de pagamento como Pix e WhatsApp. Ele também conversa sobre os avanços tecnológicos no sistema financeiro e o futuro do setor bancário. Caffarelli detalha o projeto piloto realizado pela Cielo, que permite o pagamento de contas apenas pela identificação facial.

programme.title: O Crime Não Compensa
programme.desc: Os crimes passionais mais chocantes do país são recriados por psicólogos, psiquiatras, promotores e investigadores. Veja também depoimentos das famílias das vítimas e dos acusados.

programme.desc: O programa Roda a Roda Jequiti possibilita aos participantes concorrerem a prêmios em barras de ouro. Até hoje, já foram pagos muitos milhões em prêmios aos consultores e clientes que foram sorteados para a atração. A pessoa que comprar um produto Jequiti ganha um cupom para participar do programa, que deve ser preenchido e entregue a um consultor Jequiti. Se for sorteado, ele e seu consultor irão a São Paulo com tudo pago para participar do programa.

programme.title: Chiquititas - Edição Especial
programme.desc: Fundado por um empresário com motivos misteriosos, o orfanato Raio de Luz é a casa de Mili e várias outras crianças que enfrentam juntas os desafios da vida.

programme.title: Pra Ganhar É Só Rodar
programme.desc: Silvio Santos comanda esse animado programa e distribui prêmios incríveis aos participantes. Os sorteados vão até o palco, rodam cinco piões contendo fotos dos artistas do SBT e torcem para ganhar o melhor prêmio.

programme.title: Programa do Ratinho
programme.desc: O apresentador Carlos Massa leva ao público um programa alegre e repleto de atrações. Ele recebe convidados famosos e traz resultados de testes de DNA.

programme.title: The Noite com Danilo Gentili
programme.desc: Talk show com alto índice de piadas por minuto, que, com muita irreverência, aborda os fatos relevantes do dia.

programme.title: Operação Mesquita
programme.desc: Descubra o lado B dos famosos, que mostram o seu cotidiano de forma curiosa e divertida por meio de entrevistas. Acompanhe ainda pessoas comuns que estão prestes a protagonizar um grande momento que pode mudar para sempre as suas vidas.

programme.title: Conexão Repórter
programme.desc: Acompanhe grandes reportagens investigativas sobre casos de polícia e outros temas.

programme.title: SBT Brasil
programme.desc: Acompanhe as principais notícias do Brasil e do mundo com análise profunda dos fatos.

programme.title: Primeiro Impacto
programme.desc: Acompanhe as reportagens que trazem informações do dia a dia. Saiba o que é relevante para o cenário cotidiano através de análises e opiniões de colunistas.

programme.title: Primeiro Impacto
programme.desc: Acompanhe as reportagens que trazem informações do dia a dia. Saiba o que é relevante para o cenário cotidiano através de análises e opiniões de colunistas.

programme.title: Vem pra Cá
programme.desc: O programa aborda as notícias do cotidiano de maneira simples, conversas sobre saúde, dicas de moda que cabem no bolso, receitas de comida saborosas, orientações de jardinagem e matérias de entretenimento.

programme.title: Bom Dia & Cia
programme.desc: Os telespectadores participam das mais divertidas brincadeiras e concorrem a prêmios, na companhia dos apresentadores mais divertidos do pedaço. O programa conta ainda com promoções, curiosidades e entrevistas com convidados especiais.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam e Cat se conhecem e se tornam amigas quando Sam se muda para Los Angeles. Elas logo começam um serviço de babá, o que as leva a muitas aventuras divertidas e malucas.

programme.title: Fofocalizando
programme.desc: Revista eletrônica com informação, humor e as principais fofocas do mundo dos famosos.

programme.title: Casos de Família
programme.desc: Conflitos que acontecem entre parentes, vizinhos e até no ambiente de trabalho são abordados e resolvidos diante de uma plateia, com uma psicóloga como supervisora.

programme.title: Triunfo do Amor
programme.desc: Um jovem casal deve lutar contra um passado que não lhes pertence e um presente que os ameaça, um mundo que parece perfeito, mas onde existe o mal e os segredos mais comoventes.

programme.title: Amores Verdadeiros
programme.desc: Victoria Balvanera é uma importante empresária que após ser vítima de um atentado, decide contratar o segurança particular Francisco Guzmán para sua filha, Nikki Briz. A partir de então, a história coloca a prova o que é um amor verdadeiro.

programme.title: SBT Brasil
programme.desc: Acompanhe as principais notícias do Brasil e do mundo com análise profunda dos fatos.

programme.title: Roda a Roda Jequiti
programme.desc: O programa Roda a Roda Jequiti possibilita aos participantes concorrerem a prêmios em barras de ouro. Até hoje, já foram pagos muitos milhões em prêmios aos consultores e clientes que foram sorteados para a atração. A pessoa que comprar um produto Jequiti ganha um cupom para participar do programa, que deve ser preenchido e entregue a um consultor Jequiti. Se for sorteado, ele e seu consultor irão a São Paulo com tudo pago para participar do programa.

programme.title: 21 Bridges
programme.desc: After uncovering a massive conspiracy, an embattled NYPD detective joins a citywide manhunt for two young cop killers. As the night unfolds, he soon becomes unsure of who to pursue -- and who's in pursuit of him. When the search intensifies, authorities decide to take extreme measures by closing all of Manhattan's 21 bridges to prevent the suspects from escaping.

programme.title: VICE
programme.desc: Immersive reporting from the frontlines of global conflicts, civil uprisings and beyond, as correspondents tackle complex geopolitical stories from all corners of the globe.

programme.title: Shameless
programme.desc: Ian and Mickey shop for furniture; Kev and V seek buyers for the Alibi; while Lip settles for a new job, Carl finds his calling on the force; Debbie plunges into a dangerous world when she meets someone; Frank faces his mortality.

programme.title: City on a Hill
programme.desc: Jackie hatches a plan to discredit the assistant district attorney; Decourcy hopes to use Jenny against her husband; Siobhan receives some welcome news, and her client is released from custody; Jimmy Ryan faces problems.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: A counselor (The Rock) at a juvenile detention facility decides to turn the young inmates in his charge into a football team to give them a sense of self-respect and social responsibility, but he faces opposition from high-school coaches who do not want their players facing criminals on the field.

programme.title: City on a Hill
programme.desc: Jackie hatches a plan to discredit the assistant district attorney; Decourcy hopes to use Jenny against her husband; Siobhan receives some welcome news, and her client is released from custody; Jimmy Ryan faces problems.

programme.title: Desus & Mero
programme.desc: Guest: Andra Day.

programme.title: Shameless
programme.desc: Ian and Mickey shop for furniture; Kev and V seek buyers for the Alibi; while Lip settles for a new job, Carl finds his calling on the force; Debbie plunges into a dangerous world when she meets someone; Frank faces his mortality.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: Clyde Shelton (Gerard Butler) is an honorable family man, until the day his wife and daughter are murdered in a home invasion. He hopes for justice, but a rising prosecutor named Nick Rice (Jamie Foxx) cuts a deal with one of the killers in exchange for testimony. Ten years later, that man is found dead and Shelton coolly admits his guilt. Then he hands Rice an ultimatum: Fix the broken legal system or suffer the consequences.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Illegal boxing promoter Turkish (Jason Statham) convinces gangster Brick Top (Alan Ford) to offer bets on bare-knuckle boxer Mickey (Brad Pitt) at his bookie business. When Mickey does not throw his first fight as agreed, an infuriated Brick Top demands another match. Meanwhile, gangster Frankie Four Fingers (Benicio Del Toro) comes to place a bet for a friend with Brick Top's bookies, as multiple criminals converge on a stolen diamond that Frankie has come to London to sell.

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Bill Parrish (Anthony Hopkins), businessman and devoted family man, is about to celebrate his 65th birthday. However, before he reaches that landmark, he is visited by Death (Brad Pitt), who has taken human form as Joe Black, a young man who recently died. Joe and Bill make a deal: Bill will be given a few extra days of his life, and Joe will spend the same time getting to know what it's like to be human. It seems like a perfect arrangement, until Joe falls in love -- with Bill's daughter.

programme.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
programme.desc: Infamous and unpredictable, Jesse James (Brad Pitt), nicknamed the fastest gun in the west, plans his next big heist while he launches pre-emptive strikes against those looking to collect the reward the law has placed on his head. Jesse's newest recruits, Robert (Casey Affleck) and Charley Ford (Sam Rockwell), grow increasingly jealous of the outlaw. When they sense an opportunity to kill Jesse, they gun him down, but their actions backfire when Jesse's fame is elevated to near mythical status.

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: Eight years after fleeing the Congo following his assassination of that country's minister of mining, former assassin Jim Terrier (Sean Penn) is back, suffering from PTSD and digging wells to atone for his violent past. After an attempt is made on his life, Terrier flies to London to find out who wants him dead -- and why. Terrier's search leads him to a reunion with Annie (Jasmine Trinca), a woman he once loved, who is now married to an oily businessman (Javier Bardem) with dealings in Africa.

programme.title: Mob Town
programme.desc: The FBI and a local cop track various members of organized crime families as they gather for a huge meeting in upstate New York in 1957.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Seasoned adventurer Dirk Pitt (Matthew McConaughey) sets out for the African desert with his sarcastic companion (Steve Zahn) in search of a ship rumored to have vanished long ago, the main draw being the treasure supposedly hidden within the lost vessel. When the daring duo come across a beautiful scientist (Penélope Cruz) who is juggling an escape from a warlord and a mission to stop the spread of a powerful plague, their desert expedition begins to heat up.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: In mid-1980s Texas, electrician Ron Woodroof (Matthew McConaughey) is stunned to learn that he has AIDS. Though told that he has just 30 days left to live, Woodroof refuses to give in to despair. He seeks out alternative therapies and smuggles unapproved drugs into the U.S. from wherever he can find them. Woodroof joins forces with a fellow AIDS patient (Jared Leto) and begins selling the treatments to the growing number of people who can't wait for the medical establishment to save them.

programme.title: City on a Hill
programme.desc: Jackie hatches a plan to discredit the assistant district attorney; Decourcy hopes to use Jenny against her husband; Siobhan receives some welcome news, and her client is released from custody; Jimmy Ryan faces problems.

programme.title: Shameless
programme.desc: Ian and Mickey shop for furniture; Kev and V seek buyers for the Alibi; while Lip settles for a new job, Carl finds his calling on the force; Debbie plunges into a dangerous world when she meets someone; Frank faces his mortality.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: In 1931, the Bondurant brothers of Franklin County, Va., run a multipurpose backwoods establishment that hides their true business, bootlegging. Middle brother Forrest (Tom Hardy) is the brain of the operation; older Howard (Jason Clarke) is the brawn, and younger Jack (Shia LaBeouf), the lookout. Though the local police have taken bribes and left the brothers alone, a violent war erupts when a sadistic lawman (Guy Pearce) from Chicago arrives and tries to shut down the Bondurants operation.

programme.title: Becky
programme.desc: Spunky and rebellious Becky tries to reconnect with her father during a weekend getaway at a lakefront house. But the trip soon takes a turn for the worse when convicts on the run, led by the merciless Dominick, suddenly invade the home.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: In mid-1980s Texas, electrician Ron Woodroof (Matthew McConaughey) is stunned to learn that he has AIDS. Though told that he has just 30 days left to live, Woodroof refuses to give in to despair. He seeks out alternative therapies and smuggles unapproved drugs into the U.S. from wherever he can find them. Woodroof joins forces with a fellow AIDS patient (Jared Leto) and begins selling the treatments to the growing number of people who can't wait for the medical establishment to save them.

programme.title: Hoosiers
programme.desc: Failed college coach Norman Dale (Gene Hackman) gets a chance at redemption when he is hired to direct the basketball program at a high school in a tiny Indiana town. After a teacher (Barbara Hershey) persuades star player Jimmy Chitwood to quit and focus on his long-neglected studies, Dale struggles to develop a winning team in the face of community criticism for his temper and his unconventional choice of assistant coach: Shooter (Dennis Hopper), a notorious alcoholic.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: Following the death of his wife, Los Angeles police detective Martin Riggs (Mel Gibson) becomes reckless and suicidal. When he is reassigned and partnered with Roger Murtaugh (Danny Glover), Riggs immediately clashes with the older officer. Together they uncover a massive drug-trafficking ring. As they encounter increasingly dangerous situations, Riggs and Murtaugh begin to form a bond. Riggs' volatile behavior might just help them apprehend the criminals -- if it doesn't kill them both first.

programme.title: Cop Land
programme.desc: When hotheaded Superboy (Michael Rapaport) accidentally gets involved in an ugly racially-motivated incident, his uncle Ray Donlan (Harvey Keitel), a corrupt New York City cop, attempts to sweep it under the rug by helping fake his nephew's death. The bungled cover-up leads to investigations by idealistic Internal Affairs officer Moe Tilden (Robert De Niro) and Freddy Heflin (Sylvester Stallone), sheriff of the suburban New Jersey town where Donlan and his fellow crooked policemen live.

programme.title: Kate & Leopold
programme.desc: Kate McKay (Meg Ryan) is a modern day executive, a 21st century woman driven to succeed in the corporate world. Leopold, the third Duke of Albany, is a charming gent and bachelor of the late 18OOs. With career and social expectations looming, each has grown cynical about the very notion of falling in love. But when a rip in the fabric of time thrusts Leopold into present day New York, the potential for an old-fashioned modern romance ignites.

programme.title: Made in Italy
programme.desc: A London artist and his estranged son try to mend their relationship as they work together to repair a dilapidated house in Italy.

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: Set on the last day of camp, in the hot summer of 1981, "Wet Hot American Summer" follows a group of counselors who are each trying to complete their unfinished business before the day ends. The entire summer of pent-up sexual frustrations, unresolved post-traumatic stress, pending separations and of course, the talent show, all weigh heavily on the minds and groins of counselors and campers alike.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: After surviving an assault from a squad of hit men, retired CIA agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) reassembles his old team for an all-out war. Frank reunites with old Joe (Morgan Freeman), crazy Marvin (John Malkovich) and wily Victoria (Helen Mirren) to uncover a massive conspiracy that threatens their lives. Only their expert training will allow them to survive a near-impossible mission -- breaking into CIA headquarters.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: Following the death of his wife, Los Angeles police detective Martin Riggs (Mel Gibson) becomes reckless and suicidal. When he is reassigned and partnered with Roger Murtaugh (Danny Glover), Riggs immediately clashes with the older officer. Together they uncover a massive drug-trafficking ring. As they encounter increasingly dangerous situations, Riggs and Murtaugh begin to form a bond. Riggs' volatile behavior might just help them apprehend the criminals -- if it doesn't kill them both first.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: South African smugglers find themselves being hounded and harassed by Riggs and Murtaugh, two mismatched Los Angeles police officers. However, the South Africans are protected by diplomatic immunity, and so the two are assigned to witness-protection duty in an attempt by their captain to keep his job. It is only when this witness reveals to them that he has already dealt with the smugglers that the trouble really starts.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3
programme.desc: Veteran police detective Roger Murtaugh (Danny Glover) is only days away from retiring when he and his tough partner, Martin Riggs (Mel Gibson), are roped into an important internal affairs case. Working with the beautiful, no-nonsense Sergeant Lorna Cole (Rene Russo) and aided by the shifty informant Leo Getz (Joe Pesci), Murtaugh and Riggs begin to close in on a black-market weapons operation involving corrupt cop and arms dealer Jack Travis (Stuart Wilson).

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 4
programme.desc: Detective Riggs (Mel Gibson) tries to settle down with his pregnant girlfriend, Lorna (Rene Russo), while his partner, Murtaugh (Danny Glover), comes to grips with the marriage of his pregnant daughter, Rianne (Traci Wolfe), to fellow cop Butters (Chris Rock). But they find themselves and their families targeted by Chinese mobsters, led by Wah Sing Ku (Jet Li). Riggs, Murtaugh, Butters and private eye Getz (Joe Pesci) decide to go on the offensive before the gangsters get to their loved ones.

programme.title: Desus & Mero
programme.desc: Guest: Andra Day.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: New Jersey bartender Jon Martello (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) knows what's important: his friends, his family, his car, his church, his sexual conquests -- and porn. In fact, Jon is a porn addict and has never had a genuine relationship with a woman. However, when he meets Barbara (Scarlett Johansson) he has to change his operating methods, because Barbara won't be bedded easily. For the first time in his life, Jon begins a real courtship, but his obsession with erotica threatens to ruin everything.

programme.title: Waves
programme.desc: The epic emotional journey of a suburban African American family as they navigate love, forgiveness and coming together in the wake of a tragic loss.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: "Fargo" is a reality-based crime drama set in Minnesota in 1987. Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) is a car salesman in Minneapolis who has gotten himself into debt and is so desperate for money that he hires two thugs (Steve Buscemi), (Peter Stormare) to kidnap his own wife. Jerry will collect the ransom from her wealthy father (Harve Presnell), paying the thugs a small portion and keeping the rest to satisfy his debts. The scheme collapses when the thugs shoot a state trooper.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The epic biography of western lawman Wyatt Earp, who at an early age, is taught that nothing matters more than family and the law. He becomes a respected sheriff in Dodge City and Tombstone. Joined by his brothers and Doc Holliday, Earp wages war on the dreaded Clanton and McLaury gangs.

programme.title: The Big Hit
programme.desc: Affable hit man Melvin Smiley (Mark Wahlberg) is constantly being scammed by his cutthroat colleagues in the life-ending business. So, when he and his fellow assassins kidnap the daughter of an electronics mogul, it's naturally Melvin who takes the fall when their prime score turns sour. That's because the girl is the goddaughter of the gang's ruthless crime boss. But, even while dodging bullets, Melvin has to keep his real job secret from his unsuspecting fiancée, Pam (Christina Applegate).

programme.title: Hustlers
programme.desc: Working as a stripper to make ends meet, Destiny's life changes forever when she becomes friends with Ramona -- the club's top money earner. Ramona soon shows Destiny how to finagle her way around the wealthy Wall Street clientele who frequent the club. But when the 2008 economic collapse cuts into their profits, the gals and two other dancers devise a daring scheme to take their lives back.

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: After losing his job and wife, and spending time in a mental institution, Pat Solatano (Bradley Cooper) winds up living with his parents (Robert De Niro, Jacki Weaver). He wants to rebuild his life and reunite with his wife, but his parents would be happy if he just shared their obsession with the Philadelphia Eagles. Things get complicated when Pat meets Tiffany (Jennifer Lawrence), who offers to help him reconnect with his wife, if he will do something very important for her in exchange.

programme.title: Shameless
programme.desc: Ian and Mickey shop for furniture; Kev and V seek buyers for the Alibi; while Lip settles for a new job, Carl finds his calling on the force; Debbie plunges into a dangerous world when she meets someone; Frank faces his mortality.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: "Fargo" is a reality-based crime drama set in Minnesota in 1987. Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) is a car salesman in Minneapolis who has gotten himself into debt and is so desperate for money that he hires two thugs (Steve Buscemi), (Peter Stormare) to kidnap his own wife. Jerry will collect the ransom from her wealthy father (Harve Presnell), paying the thugs a small portion and keeping the rest to satisfy his debts. The scheme collapses when the thugs shoot a state trooper.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: Clyde Shelton (Gerard Butler) is an honorable family man, until the day his wife and daughter are murdered in a home invasion. Ten years later, that man is found dead and Shelton coolly admits his guilt. Then he hands Rice an ultimatum: Fix the broken legal system or suffer the consequences.

programme.title: Desus & Mero
programme.desc: The popular TV and podcast personalities speak off the cuff and chat with guests at the intersection of pop culture, sports, music, politics and more.

programme.title: City on a Hill
programme.desc: Jackie hatches a plan to discredit the assistant district attorney; Decourcy hopes to use Jenny against her husband; Siobhan receives some welcome news, and her client is released from custody; Jimmy Ryan faces problems.

programme.title: Desus & Mero
programme.desc: The popular TV and podcast personalities speak off the cuff and chat with guests at the intersection of pop culture, sports, music, politics and more.

programme.title: VICE
programme.desc: Immersive reporting from the frontlines of global conflicts, civil uprisings and beyond, as correspondents tackle complex geopolitical stories from all corners of the globe.

programme.title: Outlaws
programme.desc: When the leader of a motorcycle gang is released from prison, he must fight his former deputy for control of his turf in an epic clash of gang warfare and personal rivalry.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Freddie Quell (Joaquin Phoenix) is a troubled, boozy drifter struggling with the trauma of World War II and whatever inner demons ruled his life before that. On a fateful night in 1950, Freddie boards a passing boat and meets Lancaster Dodd (Philip Seymour Hoffman), the charismatic leader of a religious movement called the Cause. Freddie tries hard to adhere to Dodd's weird teachings and forms a close bond with his mentor, even as other members of Dodd's inner circle see him as a threat.

programme.title: The Ides of March
programme.desc: As Ohio's Democratic primary nears, charming Gov. Mike Morris (George Clooney) seems a shoo-in for the nomination over his opponent, Sen. Pullman (Michael Mantell). Morris' idealistic press secretary, Stephen Meyers (Ryan Gosling), believes in his candidate's integrity and the democratic process. But Meyers' meeting with Pullman's campaign manager (Paul Giamatti) and a dalliance with a young intern (Evan Rachel Wood) set in motion events that threaten Morris' election chances.

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Born into poverty, Ernie Davis (Rob Brown) overcomes many obstacles to get into Syracuse University's football program. Under the guidance of Coach Ben Schwartzwalder (Dennis Quaid), Davis becomes one of the school's best players, even surpassing Jim Brown's achievements. In 1961 Davis becomes the first black player to win the Heisman Trophy, but there is one more obstacle in his life that he must overcome.

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: Just as he is on the brink of winning a Senate seat, politician David Norris (Matt Damon) meets a ballerina named Elise Sellas (Emily Blunt). Though David is instantly smitten, mysterious men conspire to keep him away from the beautiful dancer. David learns that he is facing the powerful agents of Fate itself, and glimpsing the future laid out for him, must either accept a predetermined path that does not include Elise or else defy Fate to be with her.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: Successful forensic psychologist Alex Cross (Morgan Freeman) discovers that his niece has gone missing. Once he consults with police Detective Nick Ruskin (Cary Elwes), Cross believes that the disappearance is the work of an insane killer known as "Casanova." Meanwhile, Dr. Kate McTiernan (Ashley Judd) is kidnapped by this criminal and witnesses many other imprisoned women in his lair. After narrowly escaping, McTiernan teams up with Cross to try to apprehend the deranged Casanova.

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A psychological suspense thriller adapted from James Patterson's first highly acclaimed novel in the Alex Cross series, Morgan Freeman reprises his role as the Washington, D.C. police detective and psychologist who is through playing mind games with criminals -- that is until a methodical predator, Gary Soneji (Michael Wincott) commits a daring kidnapping and lures Cross into the case.

programme.title: Shameless
programme.desc: Ian and Mickey shop for furniture; Kev and V seek buyers for the Alibi; while Lip settles for a new job, Carl finds his calling on the force; Debbie plunges into a dangerous world when she meets someone; Frank faces his mortality.
