programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Twenty years after Maria Rossi (Suzan Crowley) murdered three people, her daughter, Isabella (Fernanda Andrade), seeks the truth about that terrible night. Isabella travels to an Italian hospital for the criminally insane -- where Maria is locked away -- to find out whether her mother is mentally ill or demonically possessed. With the help of two young exorcists (Simon Quarterman, Evan Helmuth), Isabella tries to cure Maria -- and engages four demons in a battle for her mother's soul.

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: 3rd Evil Dead movie. Ash (Bruce Campbell) finds himself trapped in medieval times. He must quest for the Necronomicon, a book of evil which can return him to his time. Unfortunately, he releases the evil trapped inside the book and unleashes an army of the dead.

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, siblings Ellie (Christina Ricci) and Jimmy (Jesse Eisenberg) come across an accident on Mulholland Drive. As they try to help the woman caught in the wreckage, a ferocious creature attacks them, devouring the woman and scratching the terrified siblings. They slowly discover that the creature was a werewolf and that they have fallen victim to a deadly curse. Now that they have been sliced by the werewolf's claws, they will be transformed into werewolves themselves.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Complex sociological themes run through this science-fiction classic about three astronauts marooned on a futuristic planet where apes rule and humans are slaves. The stunned trio discovers that these highly intellectual simians can both walk upright and talk. They have even established a class system and a political structure. The astronauts suddenly find themselves part of a devalued species, trapped and imprisoned by the apes.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: In a futuristic world, a regime has eliminated war by suppressing emotions: books, art and music are strictly forbidden and feeling is a crime punishable by death. Clerick John Preston (Christian Bale) is a top-ranking government agent responsible for destroying those who resist these rules. When he misses a dose of Prozium, a mind-altering drug that hinders emotion, Preston, who has been trained to enforce strict laws of the new regime, suddenly becomes the one capable of overthrowing it.

programme.title: National Lampoon's Dorm Daze 2: College at Sea
programme.desc: College students take a chaotic cruise on a ship containing a priceless stolen jewel.

programme.title: The Fisherman
programme.desc: An aging fisherman returns from the sea with a talking fish.

programme.title: In Good Company
programme.desc: After years of working as an ad executive at a sports magazine, Dan Foreman (Dennis Quaid) is demoted and replaced with Carter Duryea (Topher Grace), a rising star in the business world who is young enough to be Dan's son. Carter's business style leaves Dan shaking his head and wondering if the young man is ready for the corporate world. Dan's life is further complicated when he learns his wife is pregnant and Carter is dating his daughter, Alex (Scarlett Johansson).

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: Radio funny man Adrian Cronauer (Robin Williams) is sent to Vietnam to bring a little comedy back into the lives of the soldiers. After setting up shop, Cronauer delights the G.I.s but shocks his superior officer, Sergeant Major Dickerson (J.T. Walsh), with his irreverent take on the war. While Dickerson attempts to censor Cronauer's broadcasts, Cronauer pursues a relationship with a Vietnamese girl named Trinh (Chintara Sukapatana), who shows him the horrors of war first-hand.

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: After Paul Duncan (Greg Kinnear) and his wife, Jessie (Rebecca Romijn-Stamos), lose their young son, Adam (Cameron Bright), in an accident, they are approached by Richard Wells (Robert De Niro), a fertility doctor. Wells believes that he can clone Adam and gives Paul and Jessie the option to let him try, but only if they start life over elsewhere. Adam's clone proves to be identical to the deceased boy, but, when he reaches his 8th birthday, things begin to go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Dark Water
programme.desc: Dahlia (Jennifer Connelly) wants to move away from her ex-husband, Kyle (Dougray Scott), and take her daughter, Ceci (Ariel Gade), with her. Relocating to a dreary tower block, Dahlia and Ceci discover eerie, dark water leaking through the ceiling of their new apartment. Dahlia petitions the supervisor (Pete Postlethwaite) and the building's owner (John C. Reilly) to fix the leak, yet it only gets worse. Now having nightmares about the dripping, Dahlia is driven to confront the problem herself.

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: Grace (Nicole Kidman), the devoutly religious mother of Anne (Alakina Mann) and Nicholas (James Bentley), moves her family to the English coast during World War II. She awaits word on her missing husband while protecting her children from a rare photosensitivity disease that causes the sun to harm them. Anne claims she sees ghosts, Grace initially thinks the new servants are playing tricks but chilling events and visions make her believe something supernatural has occurred.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: Struggling with alcoholism, Dan Torrance remains traumatized by the sinister events that occurred at the Overlook Hotel when he was a child. His hope for a peaceful existence soon becomes shattered when he meets Abra, a teen who shares his extrasensory gift of the "shine." Together, they form an unlikely alliance to battle the True Knot, a cult whose members try to feed off the shine of innocents to become immortal.

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: David Dunn (Bruce Willis) is the sole survivor of a devastating train wreck. Elijah Price (Samuel L. Jackson) is a mysterious stranger who offers a bizarre explanation as to why David escaped without a single scratch -- an explanation which threatens to change David's family and his life forever.

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In 1820, crewmen (Chris Hemsworth, Benjamin Walker, Cillian Murphy) aboard the New England vessel Essex face a harrowing battle for survival when a whale of mammoth size and strength attacks with force, crippling their ship and leaving them adrift in the ocean. Pushed to their limits and facing storms, starvation, panic and despair, the survivors must resort to the unthinkable to stay alive. Their incredible tale ultimately inspires author Herman Melville to write "Moby-Dick."

programme.title: The Good Liar
programme.desc: Career con artist Roy Courtnay can hardly believe his luck when he meets well-to-do widow Betty McLeish online. As Betty opens her life and home to him, Roy is surprised to find himself caring about her, turning what should be a cut-and-dry swindle into the most treacherous tightrope walk of his life.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: This dark action film, based on the comic book series, follows FBI agent Frank Castle (Thomas Jane) as he transforms into the vengeful Punisher after criminals murder his family, including his wife and son. Castle is gravely injured in the attack and believed to be dead by Howard Saint (John Travolta), the crime lord who ordered the hit. Following his recovery, Castle becomes a heavily armed vigilante who will stop at nothing to exact revenge on Saint and dismantle his underworld empire.

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: Paul (Stephan Enquist) and his older sister, Regina (Anna Paquin), unpack and settle into their new country home with their mother (Lena Olin) and father (Iain Glen). An atmosphere of dread slowly becomes evident in the house, and, before long, strange things are happening within its walls. As the supernatural occurrences get more intense and threatening, Regina looks into the house's dark history and struggles to uncover the reason behind the macabre presence.

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: In 1993, a freak accident involving a noose kills teenager Charlie Grimille during a high-school production of "The Gallows." Twenty years later, on the eve of the play's revival, students Reese (Reese Mishler), Pfeifer (Pfeifer Brown), Ryan (Ryan Shoos) and Cassidy become trapped in the auditorium, with no way of calling for help. A night of terror awaits the four friends as they face the wrath of a malevolent and vengeful spirit. It seems Charlie will have his curtain call after all.

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: Forced into retirement and terminally ill, a CIA agent (Nicolas Cage) gets word that his longtime nemesis (Alexander Karim) has resurfaced, so he sets out on a personal mission to kill him.

programme.title: Dead Again
programme.desc: When a mute woman suffering from amnesia (Emma Thompson) arrives at the gates of an old orphanage, private investigator Mike Church (Kenneth Branagh) is asked to find out who she is. With the help of a hypnotist (Derek Jacobi), the woman regains her voice and recalls vivid past memories of a couple from the 1940s torn apart by murder. Church begins to develop feelings for the woman, who he calls Grace, and then discovers he has a connection to the tragic couple from the 40s.

programme.title: Lawnmower Man 2: Jobe's War
programme.desc: Jobe (Matt Frewer) exists as a malevolent consciousness in virtual reality and seeks to discover the technology to hack into all the world's computers. Jobe contacts Peter (Austin O'Brien), who had been a friend during his corporeal existence, to assist him, but the young man realizes Jobe's evil intent. Peter calls on Benjamin (Patrick Bergin), a brilliant computer engineer, to help thwart Jobe's scheme for world domination, and a battle rages throughout cyberspace and in the real world.

programme.title: Project X
programme.desc: As punishment for a minor offense, the Air Force assigns pilot Jimmy Garrett (Matthew Broderick) to watch over a group of chimpanzees used for military experiments. Jimmy bonds with Virgil, a chimp capable of communicating with sign language. But when he witnesses the military's plan to kill the animals with radiation, Jimmy enlists the help of Teri MacDonald (Helen Hunt), the graduate student responsible for teaching sign language to Virgil, to free the chimps.

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: After a Hong Kong nuclear plant and the Mercantile Trade Exchange in Chicago are hacked by unknown perpetrators, a federal agent (Viola Davis) proposes that the FBI work with China to find the cyber-criminals. The leader of the Chinese team, Chen Dawai, insists that convicted hacker Nick Hathaway (Chris Hemsworth) be released from prison to help with the investigation. As Nick and his comrades chase their quarry, it becomes evident that the hackers have a sinister motive for their actions.

programme.title: Ready or Not
programme.desc: Grace couldn't be happier after she marries the man of her dreams at his family's luxurious estate. There's just one catch -- she must now hide from midnight until dawn while her new in-laws hunt her down with guns, crossbows and other weapons. As Grace desperately tries to survive the night, she soon finds a way to turn the tables on her not-so-lovable relatives.

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: In this romantic drama, Peter Bowman, an American engineer in a Latin American country is captured by anti-government forces. When the rebels learn his identity they demand $6 million for his safe return. However, his US employer is on the verge of insolvency and will not provide the ransom. Peter's wife Alice is forced to deal with the matter on her own. She retains the services of freelance professional hostage negotiator Terry Thorne.

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: To be young and carefree amid the blue waters and idyllic landscape of sun-drenched Italy in the late 1950s; that's la dolce vita Tom Ripley (Matt Damon) craves- and Dickie Greenleaf (Jude Law) leads. When Dickie's father asks Tom to bring his errant playboy son back home to America, Dickie and his beautiful expatriate girlfriend, Marge Sherwood (Gwyneth Paltrow), never suspect the dangerous extremes to which Ripley will go to make their lifestyle his own.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: The fate of Western Europe hangs on Winston Churchill in the early days of World War II. The newly appointed British prime minister must decide whether to negotiate with Hitler or fight on against incredible odds. During the next four weeks in 1940, Churchill cements his legacy as his courageous decisions and leadership help change the course of world history.

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Amsterdam Vallon (Leonardo DiCaprio) is a young Irish immigrant released from prison. He returns to the Five Points seeking revenge against his father's killer, William Cutting (Daniel Day-Lewis), a powerful anti-immigrant gang leader. He knows that revenge can only be attained by infiltrating Cutting's inner circle. Amsterdam's journey becomes a fight for personal survival and to find a place for the Irish people in 1860's New York.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Having long-since abandoned his life as a lethal soldier, John Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) lives a solitary life near the Thai border. Two weeks after guiding a missionary (Julie Benz) and her comrades into Burma, he gets an urgent call for help. The missionaries have not returned and although he is reluctant to embrace violence again, Rambo sets out to rescue the captives from the Burmese army.

programme.title: Gamer
programme.desc: Each week Kable (Gerard Butler), a death-row inmate, battles his fellow prisoners in a violent online game called "Slayers," his every move controlled by a young gamer's remote device. To the players, Kable and the other inmates are just simulated characters. But, to a resistance group that opposes the game's inventor, Kable is a critical component of their plan to end the inventor's form of high-tech slavery.

programme.title: Wedding Daze
programme.desc: One year after accidentally scaring his fiancee to death, a young man (Jason Biggs) heeds his friend's advice and begins dating again. He hurriedly proposes to a waitress (Isla Fisher), but she has issues of her own, including a pair of problematic parents (Joe Pantoliano, Joanna Gleason).

programme.title: The Ladykillers
programme.desc: Professor G.H. Dorr (Tom Hanks), a courtly Southern gentleman, arrives at the home of devout, elderly Marva Munson (Irma P. Hall), hoping to rent her extra room and use her basement to rehearse with his classical music ensemble. His fellow musicians, however, are actually criminals, and together they plan to rob a casino. When Mrs. Munson learns of their plan, they decide she must be silenced. Certainly, murdering one little old lady cannot be too difficult.

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: Sir Robert Chiltern (Jeremy Northam) is a respected government official and a loving husband. His friend, Lord Arthur Goring (Rupert Everett), is a notorious womanizer who lives a life of casual lounging, meaningless flirtations and multiple illicit affairs. But when old acquaintance Laura Cheveley (Julianne Moore) arrives in London to stir up trouble, the lives of the two men become increasingly complicated and intertwined, and their true natures are revealed.

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story
programme.desc: Despondent after breaking up with his girlfriend, Zia (Patrick Fugit) kills himself and wakes up in a bland purgatory populated by other suicides. He takes a job at Kamikaze Pizza and befriends a Russian rocker named Eugene (Shea Whigham) while trying to make the best of a very dull afterlife. Learning that his ex-girlfriend has also killed herself, Zia embarks on a road trip with Eugene to find her, picking up a feisty hitchhiker (Shannyn Sossamon) along the way.

programme.title: Holy Rollers
programme.desc: A Jewish youth (Jesse Eisenberg) risks being ostracized from his religious community when he becomes a drug mule for his best friend's older brother.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: In a futuristic world, a regime has eliminated war by suppressing emotions: books, art and music are strictly forbidden and feeling is a crime punishable by death. Clerick John Preston (Christian Bale) is a top-ranking government agent responsible for destroying those who resist these rules. When he misses a dose of Prozium, a mind-altering drug that hinders emotion, Preston, who has been trained to enforce strict laws of the new regime, suddenly becomes the one capable of overthrowing it.

programme.title: Stuber
programme.desc: A quick-tempered cop who's recovering from eye surgery recruits a mild-mannered Uber driver to help him catch the heroin dealer who murdered his partner. The mismatched pair soon find themselves in for a wild day of stakeouts and shootouts as they pursue violent criminals through the seedy streets of Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: Refusing to kill an infant from an enemy clan, master swordsman Yang (Jang Dong Gun) takes the child and flees to an American frontier town. He puts away his sword for good, vowing to raise the baby in peace. Yang befriends Lynne, a woman who wants revenge against a colonel, the man who murdered her family. When the colonel returns to wreak havoc on the town, Yang draws his sword to protect his new friends, but the sound of fighting draws Yang's murderous clansmen into the fray as well.

programme.title: Inheritance
programme.desc: A patriarch of a wealthy and powerful family suddenly passes away, leaving his wife and daughter with a shocking secret inheritance that threatens to unravel and destroy their lives.

programme.title: The Betrayed
programme.desc: Kidnappers force a young mother (Melissa George) to recover money stolen by her shady husband (Christian Campbell).

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, widowed mother Alice Zander (Elizabeth Reaser) unwittingly invites authentic evil into her home by adding a new stunt to bolster her séance scam business. When the merciless spirit overtakes her youngest daughter Doris (Lulu Wilson), the small family must confront unthinkable fears to save her and send her possessor back to the other side.

programme.title: Deep Cover
programme.desc: David Jason (Jeff Goldblum) is the biggest drug dealer in Los Angeles, and Russell Stevens (Larry Fishburne) is an undercover cop who wants to bring him down. Posing as a dealer, Stevens begins to earn the trust of the L.A. drug underworld, eventually making his way to Jason himself. But along the way he has to take his cover to depths he never thought he would have to see, including selling drugs and going to great lengths to eliminate potential competitors for Jason's drug cartel.

programme.title: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
programme.desc: While still a boy, Abraham Lincoln loses his mother to a vampire's bite. He vows revenge, but fails in the attempt, narrowly escaping with his life. He is rescued by Henry (Dominic Cooper), a charismatic vampire hunter who instructs Abe in the fine art of dispatching bloodsuckers. Abe (Benjamin Walker) continues his fight against the undead well into adulthood and his presidency, making a last stand against the ultimate vampire foe (Rufus Sewell) on the eve of the Civil War's defining battle.

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: In an era when the country's first line of defense - human intelligence - is more important than ever, comes an explosive thriller that gives an insider's view into the CIA's secret training ground: The Farm. James Clayton (Colin Farrell) might not have the attitude of a typical recruit, but he is one of the smartest graduating seniors in the country -- and he's just the person that Walter Burke (Al Pacino) wants in the Agency.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: During a special forces operation to prevent a Vietnamese general from purchasing nuclear triggers, Mike Weston's (Thomas Ian Griffith) partner, Jones (Chris Mulkey), is taken hostage. Mike escapes with the triggers and quits the Army. A year later, he learns Jones is still a prisoner in the jungle and decides to cooperate with the Army on a mission to rescue his friend. After arriving in Vietnam disguised as a tourist, Mike is captured by the general's men and taken to the prison camp.

programme.title: Welcome to Sarajevo
programme.desc: Michael Henderson (Stephen Dillane) is a reporter covering the war in Sarajevo, Bosnia-Herzegovina. He develops a competitive friendship with Flynn (Woody Harrelson), an arrogant TV reporter, as they cover the chaos and suffering occurring around them. When Henderson reports on a dilapidated orphanage, he becomes affected by the plight of its occupants. With the help of an American aid worker named Nina (Marisa Tomei), Henderson tries to find a way to smuggle the children out of the country.

programme.title: Silver City
programme.desc: A campaign manager hires a private detective (Danny Huston) after a Colorado gubernatorial candidate finds a dead body while fishing.

programme.title: American Son
programme.desc: A freshly graduated Marine returns home to his dysfunctional family for Thanksgiving.

programme.title: Special Effects
programme.desc: A filmmaker (Eric Bogosian) kills a model (Zoë Tamerlis) on camera, then makes a movie about it with her husband (Brad Rijn) and a look-alike.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Born under unusual circumstances, Benjamin Button (Brad Pitt) springs into being as an elderly man in a New Orleans nursing home and ages in reverse. Twelve years after his birth, he meets Daisy, a child who flickers in and out of his life as she grows up to be a dancer (Cate Blanchett). Though he has all sorts of unusual adventures over the course of his life, it is his relationship with Daisy, and the hope that they will come together at the right time, that drives Benjamin forward.

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: Radio funny man Adrian Cronauer (Robin Williams) is sent to Vietnam to bring a little comedy back into the lives of the soldiers. After setting up shop, Cronauer delights the G.I.s but shocks his superior officer, Sergeant Major Dickerson (J.T. Walsh), with his irreverent take on the war. While Dickerson attempts to censor Cronauer's broadcasts, Cronauer pursues a relationship with a Vietnamese girl named Trinh (Chintara Sukapatana), who shows him the horrors of war first-hand.

programme.title: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead
programme.desc: Andy (Philip Seymour Hoffman), a debt-ridden broker, needs some quick cash. He ropes his younger brother, Hank (Ethan Hawke), into a scheme to commit the perfect crime: to rob their parents' (Albert Finney, Rosemary Harris) jewelry store. The scheme goes horribly awry, and the family patriarch takes justice into his own hands, unaware that the criminals he is hunting are his own sons.

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, siblings Ellie (Christina Ricci) and Jimmy (Jesse Eisenberg) come across an accident on Mulholland Drive. As they try to help the woman caught in the wreckage, a ferocious creature attacks them, devouring the woman and scratching the terrified siblings. They slowly discover that the creature was a werewolf and that they have fallen victim to a deadly curse. Now that they have been sliced by the werewolf's claws, they will be transformed into werewolves themselves.

programme.title: Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: It has been three years since the Clone Wars began. Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor) and Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker (Hayden Christensen) rescue Chancellor Palpatine (Ian McDiarmid) from General Grievous, the commander of the droid armies, but Grievous escapes. Suspicions are raised within the Jedi Council concerning Chancellor Palpatine, with whom Anakin has formed a bond. Asked to spy on the chancellor, and full of bitterness toward the Jedi Council, Anakin embraces the Dark Side.

programme.title: Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: It has been three years since the Clone Wars began. Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor) and Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker (Hayden Christensen) rescue Chancellor Palpatine (Ian McDiarmid) from General Grievous, the commander of the droid armies, but Grievous escapes. Suspicions are raised within the Jedi Council concerning Chancellor Palpatine, with whom Anakin has formed a bond. Asked to spy on the chancellor, and full of bitterness toward the Jedi Council, Anakin embraces the Dark Side.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: Years after the collapse of civilization, the tyrannical Immortan Joe enslaves apocalypse survivors inside the desert fortress the Citadel. When the warrior Imperator Furiosa (Charlize Theron) leads the despot's five wives in a daring escape, she forges an alliance with Max Rockatansky (Tom Hardy), a loner and former captive. Fortified in the massive, armored truck the War Rig, they try to outrun the ruthless warlord and his henchmen in a deadly high-speed chase through the Wasteland.

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Arrow offers to train Roy, but Roy refuses unless Arrow reveals his true identity; Malcolm's earthquake machine is stolen by the Bronze Tiger; Laurel spins out of control after she is disbarred.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When a spell backfires, Prue takes on all of the pain in the world and is flattened by the overwhelming flood of human emotion.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Cole uses petty anger between Prue, Phoebe and Piper to break their sisterly bond and smash the bedrock of their powers.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: After Cole's true identity is revealed, Phoebe must decide between following her heart or defying her sisters.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When a she-demon takes possession of Piper before her 10-year high-school reunion, it is up to Prue and Phoebe to save their unsightly sister.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean and Sam are faced with their biggest threat: the darkness that has been unleashed; Castiel experiences the impact of Rowena's spell and remembers his battle with Crowley.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Jenna winds up in a dangerous situation and calls Dean for help, leaving Sam to deal with monsters on his own.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: While Rowena endeavors to protect herself against the Winchesters, Sam and Dean pursue a missing child connected to the Darkness; Castiel struggles to heal; Crowley looks to use the Darkness to his advantage.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean's road trip to fight monsters and demons is chronicled entirely from the Impala's perspective.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a series of murders at a bed and breakfast that used to be Lizzie Borden's home, but when a man says he saw a little girl hanging around near the time of the murders, the Winchesters suspect Amara is responsible.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: Alcoholic and world-weary, U.S. Air Marshal Bill Marks (Liam Neeson) lost his passion for his work long ago. Even though lives are potentially at stake during every flight, he sees the assignment as just a desk job. However, his "ordinary day at the office" becomes a high-stakes crisis during a flight to London. Marks receives a series of text messages demanding that he instruct the airline to transfer $150 million into an offshore account, or a passenger will die every 20 minutes.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: Insurance salesman Michael is on his daily commute home, which quickly becomes anything but routine. After being contacted by a mysterious stranger, Michael is forced to uncover the identity of a hidden passenger on the train before the last stop. As he works against the clock to solve the puzzle, he realizes a deadly plan is unfolding, and he is unwittingly caught up in a criminal conspiracy that carries life and death stakes for everyone on the train.

programme.title: Los Angeles Clippers vs. Indiana Pacers
programme.desc: NBA Basketball

programme.title: Boston Celtics vs. Portland Trail Blazers
programme.desc: NBA Basketball

programme.title: NBA on TNT Tuesday
programme.desc: Dwyane Wade, Candace Parker, Shaquille O'Neal and Adam Lefkoe recap game action, news and notes from the NBA's season restart; the conversation will also touch on entertainment, business, lifestyle, fashion and social activism.

programme.title: Los Angeles Clippers vs. Indiana Pacers

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A Marine's murder reveals new clues in the first case LaSalle and Pride worked together; a Thanksgiving celebration at Pride's bar.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Wade's adopted son becomes a suspect after a series of Christmas burglaries turn deadly; Brody and LaSalle tease Sonja about the team's holiday gift exchange.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: An evil ice-cream man lures Prue and Phoebe into another dimension, where they are tricked into harming an innocent person.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters battle a warlock who exterminates witches and takes their powers; an interfering "Whitelighter" causes friction between Piper and Leo.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When Prue (Shannen Doherty) discovers that her ex-boyfriend (guest star Marco Sanchez) is mutating into a demon, she and her sisters (Holly Marie Combs, Alyssa Milano) battle for his soul in an underworld wrestling ring. WCW wrestlers Slammer, Thunder and Mega-Man also guest star.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A warlock tricks Prue into marrying him in an effort to steal the Book of Shadows; Phoebe and Piper turn to the dark side and delight in their evil powers.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Castiel asks Metatron to help stop the Darkness, but Metatron is happy with his new life and reluctant to assist; Crowley's hold on Amara loosens.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sheriff Donna asks Dean and Sam for help with a murder that has supernatural elements; Sam's visions continue.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam is surprised when his childhood imaginary friend, Sully, suddenly shows up and Dean can see him too.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Amara issues a shocking challenge, unleashing her power on the local residents; Dean tries to make sense of the hold Amara has on him; Sam and Crowley come up with a potentially disastrous plan.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Lucifer offers Sam a costly way out of the cage; Dean and Castiel investigate the angel smiting that might have killed Amara.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When people are met with violent deaths after listening to a mysterious song, Dean and Sam investigate.

programme.title: Dirty Grandpa
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Jason Kelly (Zac Efron) is one week away from marrying his boss's controlling daughter, putting him on the fast track for a partnership at his firm. Tricked by his grandfather Dick (Robert De Niro), Jason finds himself driving the foulmouthed old man to Daytona Beach, Fla., for a wild spring break that includes frat parties, bar fights and an epic night of karaoke. While Jason worries about the upcoming wedding, Dick tries to show his grandson how to live life to the fullest.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Bullied as a teen for being overweight, Bob Stone (Dwayne Johnson) shows up to his high school reunion looking fit and muscular. While there, he finds Calvin Joyner (Kevin Hart), a fast-talking accountant who misses his glory days as a popular athlete. Stone is now a lethal CIA agent who needs Calvin's number skills to help him save the compromised U.S. spy satellite system. Together, the former classmates encounter shootouts, espionage and double-crosses while trying to prevent worldwide chaos.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Dynamite
programme.desc: A world-class roster of diverse male and female wrestlers give fans a new wrestling experience for the first time in 20 years. Featuring Cody & Brandi Rhodes, The Young Bucks, Kenny Omega, Hangman Adam Page, Chris Jericho and Jon Moxley.

programme.title: ONE on TNT II
programme.desc: Lightweight world champion Christian Lee defends his title against No. 3-ranked lightweight Timofey Nastyukhin.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Bullied as a teen for being overweight, Bob Stone (Dwayne Johnson) shows up to his high school reunion looking fit and muscular. While there, he finds Calvin Joyner (Kevin Hart), a fast-talking accountant who misses his glory days as a popular athlete. Stone is now a lethal CIA agent who needs Calvin's number skills to help him save the compromised U.S. spy satellite system. Together, the former classmates encounter shootouts, espionage and double-crosses while trying to prevent worldwide chaos.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride and the team investigate a Russian sleeper agent involved with Abby's brother; Sebastian goes to Washington, D.C., to work with Abby; Bishop drives all night to deliver a package and help the New Orleans team.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A Mardi Gras celebration at Pride's bar is cut short when he and Mayor Douglas Hamilton (Steven Weber) are abducted by unknown assailants.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Evidence suggests that the man responsible for saving a lieutenant's life is a soldier who was captured in Afghanistan.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride and the team uncover a domestic drug ring -- led by Sonja's childhood friend, Marion Watkins (Samaire Armstrong), that is producing cocaine.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When Phoebe becomes caught up in a ghost town's violent past, Prue must travel back in time to rescue her sister from an appalling fate.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Piper's wedding day is jeopardized when Prue is arrested on suspicion of murder after her astral self engages in late-night shenanigans.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Prue staves off the Angel of Death while trying to save someone's life, but she ultimately comes to terms with the inevitable.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: As Piper and Leo prepare to move out, the sisters remember what life was like before they found out they were the most powerful witches of all time.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Claire thinks recent murders in town are supernatural and asks Sam and Dean for help; Jody Mills reveals that Claire has been attacking people and accusing them of being monsters.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: While investigating a set of murders on Valentine's Day, Sam and Dean find they are dealing with an ancient curse that causes victims, once kissed by it, to die.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When Dean needs to go back in time to find a weapon that is powerful enough to defeat Amara (Emily Swallow), he turns to Castiel/Lucifer for help.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean and Sam decide to take a break and attend the funeral of a wrestler they were fans of as kids; when another wrestler turns up dead, the brothers quickly return to work.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: After an insidious creature is accidentally released into an old house, leaving a mother and child in a coma, the Winchesters must reach into the past to devise a plan to catch the monster before it kills someone.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan's father (Ryan O'Neal) invites a distant relative, Margaret Whitesell (Zooey Deschanel), to spend Christmas with him and his daughter; Brennan and Booth investigate when a man dressed as Santa Claus is blown up after a botched bank robbery.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth travel to Mexico to investigate human remains with extraterrestrial attributes; Angela and intern Wendell come clean about their relationship.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Government agents demand that Brennan and her team determine a cause of death for an unidentified and highly classified set of remains; Cam thinks Michelle is keeping a secret from her.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A human skeleton is found in the trenches of a Civil War battleground; Booth's brother returns from his trip with surprising news.

programme.title: Fast Foodies
programme.desc: The stars of Tacoma FD go all out; cracking the ultimate fried chicken code of this famous poultry puzzle will put the chefs to the test in the copycat round.

programme.title: Inside the NBA
programme.desc: This Emmy Award-winning studio show, which airs following each NBA telecast on TNT, is hosted by Ernie Johnson, with analysis from Hall of Famer Charles Barkley and NBA champions Kenny Smith and Shaquille O'Neal. It's a mix of highlights, interviews and hijinks, notably the verbal sparring sessions between the outspoken Barkley and his straight man, Smith. The show also welcomes various guest analysts throughout the season.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.desc: A demon forces the sisters to wrestle with the seven deadly sins -- greed, pride, envy, anger, gluttony, lust and sloth.

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Prue turns into a dog while tracking down a banshee, but when she is hit by a car, the banshee goes after Phoebe.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After Pride's daughter is attacked on campus, the team finds a surveillance van loaded with pictures of the special agent's every move.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates when a Navy lieutenant is murdered during a traditional funeral procession in the French Quarter honoring the recently deceased.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a Navy lieutenant dies during a secret visit to a general's hotel, agent Pride and the team are asked to break protocol for the investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: While visiting her family's restaurant in the French Quarter, a Navy culinary specialist is the target of an explosion; in D.C., Brody tracks a lead in the Gen. Leak case.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS teams with Homeland Security when the murder of a Navy master diver is discovered to be linked to the chatter concerning a foreign attack on the city.

programme.title: Bones

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Dr. Sweets deals with post traumatic stress after his subway train is derailed by flood water; a partially skeletonized body is discovered.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Recounting the events of the first case on which Brennan and Booth worked together; how other Jeffersonian team members' relationships began.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan returns to her former high school to investigate when unidentified human remains are discovered; Booth and Brennan pose as a married couple at her high school reunion.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth are asked to identify human remains found inside the belly of a shark; a marine biologist (Rena Sofer) is interested in Booth.

programme.title: No Mundo da Bola
programme.desc: O programa promove debates esportivos e é inspirado no programa homônimo da Rádio Nacional do Rio de Janeiro, no ar desde 1930. Apresentado por Sergio du Bocage, tem como comentaristas fixos os jornalistas Márcio Guedes e Alberto Léo.

programme.title: O Vigilante Rodoviário
programme.desc: Um menino quer ver Pelé após uma partida de futebol e acaba refém de homens que roubam o estádio. É organizada uma operação envolvendo a Polícia Rodoviária para capturar o bando, mas é preciso correr contra o tempo.

programme.title: Partituras
programme.desc: A paulista Sonia Rubinski faz uma emocionante apresentação nas dependências do belo Palácio do Itamaraty, em Brasília.

programme.title: Work In Progress - Por Dentro do Balé da Cidade de São Paulo
programme.desc: Conheça a trajetória do Balé da Cidade de São Paulo desde a sua fundação há 50 anos, quando ainda se chamava Corpo de Baile Municipal.

programme.title: Brasil Visto de Cima
programme.desc: No norte de Minas, imensos descampados se alternam com montanhas e chapadas. São os Sertões Gerais, onde o sol escaldante inunda as paisagens e cidades de luz e vida.

programme.title: Faróis do Brasil
programme.desc: Localizado em um ponto estratégico, na entrada do porto de Imbituba e em um ponto bem alto para a observação das baleias, o farol tem acesso por uma trilha aberta para incentivar a prática do turismo sustentável.

programme.title: Especial Itaipu
programme.desc: Conheça a história da construção da usina e os primeiros estudos sobre o potencial energético do rio Paraná. Saiba mais sobre os desentendimentos entre Brasil e Paraguai a respeito da área fronteiriça e também a assinatura do acordo.

programme.title: Brasil em Pauta
programme.desc: O programa traz um representante do Governo Federal para tratar de temas ligados direta ou indiretamente à vida do cidadão. O objetivo é ampliar o acesso da população a informações sobre projetos e ações do Governo.

programme.title: Caminhos da Reportagem
programme.desc: Cólicas intestinais, desconfortos abdominais, inchaços, diarreias, dermatites e enxaquecas são sintomas de intolerância alimentar ao glúten, ovo e lactose. Descubra se o pãozinho e café com leite podem fazer muito mal.

programme.title: Ayrton - Retratos e Memórias
programme.desc: A série documental resgata a trajetória da carreira e da vida pessoal de Ayrton Senna. No primeiro episódio, conhecemos seu início no kart e a enorme percepção que tinha nas pistas de corrida.

programme.title: Chofer de Praça
programme.desc: Para ajudar o filho a concluir os estudos de medicina, um homem consegue um emprego de taxista num calhambeque caindo aos pedaços. Apesar do esforço, ele causa vergonha por suas barbeiragens no trânsito.

programme.title: Rio Grande Rural
programme.desc: Cidadania e a inclusão social do público assistido pela extensão rural: pequenos agricultores, quilombolas, indígenas, agricultores assentados da reforma agrária e pescadores.

programme.title: Rio Grande Rural
programme.desc: Cidadania e a inclusão social do público assistido pela extensão rural: pequenos agricultores, quilombolas, indígenas, agricultores assentados da reforma agrária e pescadores.

programme.title: Vale Agrícola
programme.desc: Conheça uma pousada rural que já está na quarta geração. Acolhimento é o segredo para atrair visitantes; a escola que conseguiu mudar a realidade da comunidade ao entorno, com educação ambiental.

programme.title: Repórter Nacional
programme.desc: Um giro com tudo o que você precisa saber para começar o dia bem informado.

programme.title: Brasil em Dia
programme.desc: Acompanhe as notícias atualizadas do governo federal e os fatos importantes do dia.

programme.title: Os Chocolix
programme.desc: As crianças da escola vão para um acampamento de férias; lá, eles disputam vários jogos de competição; para isso eles resolvem se dividir em duas equipes: meninos contra meninas.

programme.title: Os Chocolix
programme.desc: A avó de Caramelo conta para ela e seus amigos Chocolyne, Chocomark e Max a lenda do pirata Barba Choco, que enterrara um valioso tesouro em algum canto do Reino da Chocolândia, colocando várias armadilhas.

programme.title: Bubu e as Corujinhas
programme.desc: Bubu e seus amigos brincam no bosque quando veem umas pegadas e tentam descobrir de que bicho é.

programme.title: Kiwi
programme.desc: Os Kiwis procuram os óculos de uma toupeira e aprendem palavras como lupa (magnifier), chifre (horn), pegada (paw print) e rinoceronte (rhinoceros).

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Pablo acorda com ruídos e batidas, então decide desenhar uma caverna para se esconder pois tem medo do dragão do barulho. Então, seus amigos também se escondem e o ajudam a desenhar um castelo para se proteger melhor contra o monstro.

programme.title: Bela Criativa
programme.desc: As crianças chegam à creche e se deparam com um muro no meio do pátio. Elas criam teorias sobre ele e acham que a creche será dividida ao meio.

programme.title: A Ratinha e o Urso
programme.desc: Ernest encontra com seu velho amigo Léon, com quem tocava música quando era jovem. Léon insiste que ele o acompanhe novamente em turnê.

programme.title: Exploradores Espaciais
programme.desc: Resfriado, Eagle fica na Stardust Bay enquanto os cadetes testam um avançado sistema de motores solares perto do Sol. Porém, Eagle descobre que a órbita de Mercúrio bloqueará o Sol, prejudicando os motores e colocando todos em perigo.

programme.title: Martin Manhã
programme.desc: Martin é um mecânico hoje e dá um carona a seu amigo Gromo em seu caminhão.

programme.title: O Poderoso Mike
programme.desc: Stephan atualiza o sistema de segurança da casa e parece que Mike pode relaxar um pouco como cão de guarda. Infelizmente, o sistema funciona tão bem que identifica até Mike como um invasor.

programme.title: Tainá e os Guardiões da Amazônia
programme.desc: Opidê é um peixe-boi de 300 quilos que não precisa mais que a dona peixe-boi cuide dele. Acontece que a dona Peixe-boi é superprotetora, e fica atazanando os outros filhotes, não deixando eles fazerem nada.

programme.title: O Show da Luna!
programme.desc: A família de Luna está visitando antigas ruínas em Israel, quando encontram uma coisa muito interessante, dois arcos de pedra que ficaram inteiros, mesmo depois de milênios. Eles começam a se perguntar como as pedras do arco ficam firmes.

programme.title: SOS Fada Manu
programme.desc: Valquíria usa um feitiço em Ignus para que seu dragão fique violento e solte fogo. Ele acaba se voltando contra a própria dona, e Valquíria pede ajuda à Manu para vencê-lo.

programme.title: Angelo
programme.desc: Angelo e Sherwood quebram a estátua favorita da mamãe enquanto jogam bola na sala de estar. Agora, eles precisam encobrir os rastros fazendo os pais acreditarem que Peter é o culpado.

programme.title: Eu Sou um Gênio
programme.desc: Ziggy está sempre chateando Diego e criticando os seus amigos o tempo todo. Diego, então, deseja que Ziggy seja um gênio bom por apenas um dia. O guaxinim ganha óculos escuros cor-de-rosa e passa a enxergar o mundo de uma boa maneira.

programme.title: Mirette Investiga
programme.desc: Boris, o urso pardo do jardim das plantas, desaparece. Recomenda-se que os parisienses não saiam de casa. Imediatamente, Mirette arrasta o Jean-Pat junto para esse novo mistério.

programme.title: Meu Cavaleiro e Eu
programme.desc: Cat precisa resgatar Jimmy e Henri de Bad jack. E a Rainha insiste em se unir a Cat, trajando a fantasia do Cisne, uma heroína que ela idolatrava enquanto criança.

programme.title: Bottersnikes & Gumbles
programme.desc: Bounce precisa apenas escalar mais uma montanha para finalmente bater mais um recorde do Gumbledex. Para isso ele usa um balão de ar quente alimentado por puns de bottersnikes.

programme.title: Repórter Brasil Tarde

programme.title: As Aventuras do Avião Vermelho
programme.desc: Um filme sobre a imaginação, no qual o protagonista viaja ao redor do mundo, superando seus medos e fazendo novas descobertas.

programme.title: Mar Brasil
programme.desc: 17% da proteína consumida no mundo vem do mar, porém, décadas de exploração desordenada fizeram com que os estoques pesqueiros mundiais diminuíssem radicalmente. Além disso, a pesca industrial predatória tem colocado em risco a biodiversidade do litoral e a vida das comunidades pesqueiras tradicionais. Conheça algumas ideias que visam reverter este quadro.

programme.title: Revoluções - As Ideias que Mudaram o Mundo
programme.desc: O smartphone permitiu revolucionar o nosso dia a dia, colocando o conhecimento do mundo ao alcance de nossas mãos, democratizando a criação e o acesso à informação e às imagens por meio das redes sociais, conectando as pessoas como nunca.

programme.title: D.P.A. - Detetives do Prédio Azul
programme.desc: Theobaldo pede a ajuda de uma amiga para preparar um novo perfume que pode conquistar Leocádia. Uma cobra surge na portaria, os meninos fogem para o pátio e ela some.

programme.title: Valentins
programme.desc: O efeito da fórmula invisível acaba e Theo fica cara a cara com Randolfo. O vilão resolve, então, testar seu hipnotizador no caçula.

programme.desc: Em uma sociedade digital, pesquisa revela as sensações que notícias em papel despertam nos leitores.

programme.desc: Conheça a agroindústria da família Baldo, que consegue o selo arte; veja a abertura do Silo de Capiaçu, que pode render até três vezes mais barato que o milho.

programme.title: Os Chocolix
programme.desc: O Tio Show, que foi transformado em dragão pela bruxa Azeda, vai até o reino da Sonholândia para pegar o antídoto que fará ele voltar a ser como era antes.

programme.title: Os Chocolix
programme.desc: A família Chocolix acaba de se mudar do Reino de Chocolindo para o Reino da Chocolândia. Os pais estão felizes com a mudança, mas seus filhos, Chocomark e Chocolyne, se sentem inseguros.

programme.title: Bubu e as Corujinhas
programme.desc: Papai Coruja convida os meninos a observar alguns animais noturnos. Mas Bonie está cansada porque ficou brincando em vez de dormir cedo.

programme.title: Kiwi
programme.desc: Os Kiwis aprendem a ler e a escrever palavras como máscara (mask), perna de pau (stilts), pena (plume) e carnaval (carnival).

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: A avó de Pablo prepara sanduíches quadrados para o almoço, mas Pablo só come triângulos. Por isso, os Animais do Livro ajudam o garoto a encontrar seu verdadeiro almoço.

programme.title: Bela Criativa
programme.desc: As crianças separam brinquedos que não usam mais para doar, então Bela inventa uma brincadeira em que a turma visita o Vale dos Esquecidos, lugar para onde vão todos os brinquedos que foram deixados de lado.

programme.title: A Ratinha e o Urso
programme.desc: Ernest torna-se um guarda do museu para que Célestine possa pintar lá, mas uma pintura é roubada e ele se torna um suspeito.

programme.title: Exploradores Espaciais
programme.desc: Coot mostra uma nova ferramenta que analisa as cores dos objetos e descobre do que são feitos. Então, eles a apontam para Lua e ficam chocados com o resultado: combustível de cranberry. Agora, eles precisam resolver esse enigma.

programme.title: Martin Manhã
programme.desc: Martin acorda como uma fada, ele pode voar e tem uma varinha mágica.

programme.title: O Poderoso Mike
programme.desc: Os guaxinins tropeçam em um velho apito no lixo. Mercúrio sopra o apito como um louco e os guaxinins descobrem que ele tem poderes estranhos sobre Mike.

programme.title: Tainá e os Guardiões da Amazônia
programme.desc: Jair é um filhote de jaguatirica que é perseguido por dois filhotes de onça valentões, que caçoam do tamanho dele. Mas Jair é corajoso e enfrenta os filhotes como pode.

programme.title: O Show da Luna!
programme.desc: É o aniversário de Júpiter. Seus amigos indígenas dizem que o aniversário dele cai bem na "enchente da onça". Luna, Júpiter e Cláudio ficam confusos pois seus amigos parecem contar o tempo de um jeito bem diferente.

programme.title: SOS Fada Manu
programme.desc: Cinderela ganha o poder de transformar tudo o que toca em cristal. Sem querer, ela transforma Tarcísio e Pombelo. Manu precisa executar uma magia difícil e perigosa para reverter o feitiço.

programme.title: Angelo
programme.desc: Angelo e Sherwood estão empolgados por estarem lançando uma nova moda entre os meninos: a batalha das cuecas. Mas para conseguir fazer isso, Angelo deve fingir que realmente quer ir às compras com a mãe.

programme.title: Eu Sou um Gênio
programme.desc: Diego acabou de criar um perfil em "Meus Amigos do Deserto", uma nova rede social. Mas Diego tem apenas três amigos e ao tentar adicionar Sam Saara a sua lista, ele recebe uma resposta nada agradável do astro.

programme.title: Mirette Investiga
programme.desc: O monumento da Esfinge está aberto para o público pela primeira vez e Saoussen está encarregada dos primeiros passeios. Mas a jovem guia desaparece dentro do monumento, como se fosse mágica.

programme.title: Meu Cavaleiro e Eu
programme.desc: A Bruxa Má transforma todos os cavaleiros em sapos com exceção de Henri. Jimmy elabora um plano perfeito para derrotar a bruxa, mas nem tudo sai como o planejado.

programme.title: Bottersnikes & Gumbles
programme.desc: Bounce tem comido muitas larvas desde o Dia do Desavermar, não deixando nenhuma para Willi. Para compensar sua avareza, ela cria um plano para pegar flores bem debaixo dos narizes melequentos dos bottersnikes.

programme.title: Jill & Joy - O Segredo do Orfanato
programme.desc: Jill e Joy são garotas felizes, que costumam brincar no campo perto da casa onde moram. Certo dia, um orfanato é inaugurado perto dali e elas descobrem que um dos meninos está desaparecido. Determinadas a ajudá-lo, elas decidem partir em uma jornada na intenção de resgatar o garoto.

programme.title: Brasil Visto de Cima
programme.desc: Altamira é o maior município brasileiro, com uma área equivalente à do Uruguai. Fordlândia é uma cidade idealizada pelo empresário americano Henry Ford. Surpresas e belezas do interior do Pará.

programme.title: Terra - O Poder do Planeta
programme.desc: Por meio de imagens de satélite, a série revela novos pontos de vista do nosso planeta e examina as grandes forças que o moldam, como vulcões, oceanos, atmosfera e gelo.

programme.desc: Luna, uma garota de seis anos que ama ciências, acredita que a Terra é um enorme laboratório em que ela pode descobrir diversas curiosidades. A cada episódio, uma curiosidade é abordada, seja no quintal de casa ou na praia, Luna, seu irmão mais novo, Júpiter, de quatro anos e o furão de estimação da família, Cláudio, praticam ciência diariamente, formulando hipóteses e fazendo experimentos. Criativa, curiosa e destemida, Luna utiliza sua imaginação para descobrir suas diversas dúvidas.

programme.title: D.P.A. - Detetives do Prédio Azul
programme.desc: Três amigos inseparáveis que moram no mesmo edifício formam o D.P.A, Detetives do Prédio Azul. O líder do grupo é Tom, um menino que adora ler e sonha em ser músico de uma banda de rock. Além disso, Tom não pode comer doce, nem tomar leite por causa da sua mãe Rafaela, uma jovem bonita e alternativa que parece viver em outro mundo. A única menina do trio é Mila, que torce por seu pai namorar Rafaela. E para completar a trupe, Capim entra em ação. O filho do porteiro do prédio aspira ser escritor e escrever as aventuras dos detetives do prédio azul. O único obstáculo do D.P.A. é Dona Leocádia, a síndica do prédio que está sempre implicando com a garotada e faz de tudo para acabar com suas brincadeiras.

programme.title: Valentins
programme.desc: Quatro irmãos precisam aprender a se virar sozinhos enquanto tentam entender o desaparecimento misterioso dos pais.

programme.title: Repórter Brasil Tarde
programme.desc: Apresentado no Rio de Janeiro, o telejornal tem o apoio de emissoras públicas de todo o país. Acompanhe as principais notícias do Brasil e do mundo. Reportagens voltadas para o cidadão são os destaques do programa.

programme.title: Brasil Visto de Cima
programme.desc: Embarque em um emocionante voo pelo Brasil. Por meio de imagens feitas em helicópteros e drones, surgem ângulos, visões e reflexões sobre os encantos, as belezas, as curiosidades e as contradições de um país imenso e cheio de surpresas.

programme.title: Parques do Brasil
programme.desc: Saiba tudo sobre a biodiversidade dos parques nacionais e outras unidades de conservação brasileiras. Com ênfase na relação entre o meio ambiente, a saúde e a qualidade de vida, o programa explora a fauna, a flora e o patrimônio histórico.

programme.title: Expedições
programme.desc: O programa mostra o Brasil e suas milhares de faces por meio das populações, costumes, cultura, meio ambiente, história e antropologia do país. As lentes do Expedições percorrem todo o território nacional e enfocam a realidade com profundidade. Através de depoimentos de especialistas, opinião das comunidades e de imagens captadas nas mais distantes regiões do país, o programa dá voz à pluralidade e abriga o debate, sem abrir mão da aventura. Sua missão é dar ao grande público uma macrovisão do país e de sua gente através de um olhar consciente e apaixonado por nossa terra e nossa gente.

programme.title: Os Sentidos dos Animais
programme.desc: Uma história evolutiva que começa com as primeiras formas de vida e vai até os mais sofisticados mamíferos e aves, contando como os animais desenvolveram poderosos sentidos para perceber seu ambiente.

programme.title: Revoluções - As Ideias que Mudaram o Mundo
programme.desc: Uma viagem alucinante pela história da humanidade, contada por meio de seis objetos icônicos.Hoje são objetos banais, mas que revelam como a ciência, a invenção e a tecnologia por trás deles transformou nossa realidade.

programme.desc: Conheça a beleza e a diversidade das paisagens e da vida ao ar livre em terras lusitanas.

programme.title: Acusado: Culpado ou Inocente?
programme.desc: Um relato intimista sobre o que acontece quando um indivíduo é acusado e julgado por um crime, contado pela perspectiva do réu, de seu time de advogados, e seus familiares, passando pelo processo de planejamento legal, até o julgamento.

programme.title: Poder em Foco
programme.desc: Paulo Caffarelli, presidente da Cielo, fala de novas formas de pagamento como Pix e WhatsApp. Ele também conversa sobre os avanços tecnológicos no sistema financeiro e o futuro do setor bancário. Caffarelli detalha o projeto piloto realizado pela Cielo, que permite o pagamento de contas apenas pela identificação facial.

programme.title: O Crime Não Compensa
programme.desc: Os crimes passionais mais chocantes do país são recriados por psicólogos, psiquiatras, promotores e investigadores. Veja também depoimentos das famílias das vítimas e dos acusados.

programme.title: Primeiro Impacto
programme.desc: Acompanhe as reportagens que trazem informações do dia a dia. Saiba o que é relevante para o cenário cotidiano através de análises e opiniões de colunistas.

programme.title: Vem pra Cá
programme.desc: O programa aborda as notícias do cotidiano de maneira simples, conversas sobre saúde, dicas de moda que cabem no bolso, receitas de comida saborosas, orientações de jardinagem e matérias de entretenimento.

programme.title: Bom Dia & Cia
programme.desc: Os telespectadores participam das mais divertidas brincadeiras e concorrem a prêmios, na companhia dos apresentadores mais divertidos do pedaço. O programa conta ainda com promoções, curiosidades e entrevistas com convidados especiais.

programme.title: Cidade Viva
programme.desc: Um programa popular que ressalta a cultura e os costumes de todos os piauienses, com espaço para a informação, diversão, emoção e interatividade com o público.

programme.title: Cidade Verde Esportes
programme.desc: A cobertura completa dos fatos esportivos no Piauí, Brasil e no mundo. Notícias sobre os esportes amadores e profissionais, e o trabalho dos grandes times brasileiros e internacionais.

programme.title: Jornal do Piauí
programme.desc: O programa promove debates, conduz entrevistas e relevantes matérias sobre a atualidade, destacando quadros especiais que garantem o entretenimento do telespectador.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam e Cat se conhecem e se tornam amigas quando Sam se muda para Los Angeles. Elas logo começam um serviço de babá, o que as leva a muitas aventuras divertidas e malucas.

programme.title: Fofocalizando
programme.desc: Revista eletrônica com informação, humor e as principais fofocas do mundo dos famosos.

programme.title: Casos de Família
programme.desc: Conflitos que acontecem entre parentes, vizinhos e até no ambiente de trabalho são abordados e resolvidos diante de uma plateia, com uma psicóloga como supervisora.

programme.title: Triunfo do Amor
programme.desc: Um jovem casal deve lutar contra um passado que não lhes pertence e um presente que os ameaça, um mundo que parece perfeito, mas onde existe o mal e os segredos mais comoventes.

programme.title: Amores Verdadeiros
programme.desc: Victoria Balvanera é uma importante empresária que após ser vítima de um atentado, decide contratar o segurança particular Francisco Guzmán para sua filha, Nikki Briz. A partir de então, a história coloca a prova o que é um amor verdadeiro.

programme.title: Jornal Cidade Verde
programme.desc: O piauiense confere os principais assuntos do dia e as últimas notícias da tarde com reportagens especiais, links ao vivo e entrevistas diversas.

programme.title: SBT Brasil
programme.desc: Acompanhe as principais notícias do Brasil e do mundo com análise profunda dos fatos.

programme.title: Roda a Roda Jequiti
programme.desc: O programa Roda a Roda Jequiti possibilita aos participantes concorrerem a prêmios em barras de ouro. Até hoje, já foram pagos muitos milhões em prêmios aos consultores e clientes que foram sorteados para a atração. A pessoa que comprar um produto Jequiti ganha um cupom para participar do programa, que deve ser preenchido e entregue a um consultor Jequiti. Se for sorteado, ele e seu consultor irão a São Paulo com tudo pago para participar do programa.

programme.title: Chiquititas - Edição Especial
programme.desc: Fundado por um empresário com motivos misteriosos, o orfanato Raio de Luz é a casa de Mili e várias outras crianças que enfrentam juntas os desafios da vida.

programme.title: Programa do Ratinho
programme.desc: O apresentador Carlos Massa leva ao público um programa alegre e repleto de atrações. Ele recebe convidados famosos e traz resultados de testes de DNA.

programme.desc: Veja uma mesa redonda sobre futebol, com foco na semana dos clubes.

programme.desc: Um jovem casal deve lutar contra um passado que não lhes pertence e um presente que os ameaça, um mundo que parece perfeito, mas onde existe o mal e os segredos mais comoventes.

programme.title: Amores Verdadeiros
programme.desc: Victoria Balvanera é uma importante empresária que após ser vítima de um atentado, decide contratar o segurança particular Francisco Guzmán para sua filha, Nikki Briz. A partir de então, a história coloca a prova o que é um amor verdadeiro.

programme.title: Jornal Cidade Verde
programme.desc: O piauiense confere os principais assuntos do dia e as últimas notícias da tarde com reportagens especiais, links ao vivo e entrevistas diversas.

programme.title: SBT Brasil
programme.desc: Acompanhe as principais notícias do Brasil e do mundo com análise profunda dos fatos.

programme.title: Roda a Roda Jequiti
programme.desc: O programa Roda a Roda Jequiti possibilita aos participantes concorrerem a prêmios em barras de ouro. Até hoje, já foram pagos muitos milhões em prêmios aos consultores e clientes que foram sorteados para a atração. A pessoa que comprar um produto Jequiti ganha um cupom para participar do programa, que deve ser preenchido e entregue a um consultor Jequiti. Se for sorteado, ele e seu consultor irão a São Paulo com tudo pago para participar do programa.

programme.title: Chiquititas - Edição Especial
programme.desc: Fundado por um empresário com motivos misteriosos, o orfanato Raio de Luz é a casa de Mili e várias outras crianças que enfrentam juntas os desafios da vida.

programme.title: Pra Ganhar É Só Rodar
programme.desc: Silvio Santos comanda esse animado programa e distribui prêmios incríveis aos participantes. Os sorteados vão até o palco, rodam cinco piões contendo fotos dos artistas do SBT e torcem para ganhar o melhor prêmio.

programme.title: Programa do Ratinho
programme.desc: O apresentador Carlos Massa leva ao público um programa alegre e repleto de atrações. Ele recebe convidados famosos e traz resultados de testes de DNA.

programme.title: The Noite com Danilo Gentili
programme.desc: Talk show com alto índice de piadas por minuto, que, com muita irreverência, aborda os fatos relevantes do dia.

programme.title: Operação Mesquita
programme.desc: Descubra o lado B dos famosos, que mostram o seu cotidiano de forma curiosa e divertida por meio de entrevistas. Acompanhe ainda pessoas comuns que estão prestes a protagonizar um grande momento que pode mudar para sempre as suas vidas.

programme.title: Conexão Repórter
programme.desc: Acompanhe grandes reportagens investigativas sobre casos de polícia e outros temas.

programme.title: Vem pra Cá

programme.title: Bom Dia & Cia

programme.title: Cidade Verde Esportes

programme.desc: Após passar anos em estado de coma induzido, a vampira Selene desperta e descobre que tem uma poderosa filha metade lobisomem, metade vampira. Agora Selene precisa defender a menina de um grupo de assassinos de lobisomens.

programme.title: O Patriota
programme.desc: Benjamin Martin é um veterano de guerra que renunciou às armas e decidiu viver em paz com sua família. Mas, quando os ingleses trazerem a Guerra da Independência até o seu quintal, Benjamin não vê outra saída a não ser pegar nas armas novamente, desta vez acompanhado de seu filho idealista, liderando uma rebelião contra o implacável e equipado exército britânico. No processo, ele descobre que só pode proteger sua família lutando pela liberdade da jovem nação.

Para realizar um de seus sonhos, Julien convence o pai a competirem juntos no triathlon ironman, uma das provas mais difíceis do circuito mundial. Durante o treinamento, o jovem tem a chance de reconstruir a relação com o pai, transformando a vida de toda a família.

programme.title: Good Kill - Máxima Precisão
programme.desc: O major Tommy Egan é um oficial da Força Aérea norte-americana encarregado de conduzir ataques aéreos na guerra no Afeganistão. Todos os dias, Egan passa oito horas pilotando remotamente drones contra os talibãs e, depois do trabalho, volta para casa em Las Vegas, onde vive com a esposa e com os filhos. No entanto, a cada nova missão, sua moral fica mais conturbada e Tommy começa a se desligar da vida real, vendo sua rotina familiar desmoronar enquanto o caos da guerra cresce cada vez mais.

programme.desc: Anna Greene, 16 anos, é filha de um dos casais mais ricos dos Estados Unidos. A inteligente e manipuladora jovem acaba de passar por um grande trauma relacionado à sua família. O detetive John Washington, que tem o poder de entrar na mente das pessoas, é convocado para investigar o caso. Agora, ele precisa determinar se Anna é inocente ou uma sociopata capaz de cometer assassinato.

programme.desc: Trying to win the approval of her friends, 17-year-old Tiffany sneaks out of the house to go to a Halloween bash at a fraternity. The fun soon ends when police and the cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) arrive to crash the party. Unhappy with this sudden turn of events, the vengeful collegians decide to scare Madea and her cronies with a series of pranks. She soon finds herself under attack and on the run from an assortment of ghosts, ghouls and zombies on the scariest night of the year.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: Four couples, all friends, descend on a tropical island resort. Though one husband and wife are there to work on their marriage, the others just want to enjoy some fun in the sun. What started out as a cut-rate vacation turns into an examination of the common problems many face.

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Brennan Huff (Will Ferrell) and Dale Doback (John C. Reilly) have one thing in common: they are both lazy, unemployed leeches who still live with their parents. When Brennan's mother and Dale's father marry and move in together, it turns the overgrown boys' world upside down. Their insane rivalry and narcissism pull the new family apart, forcing them to work together to reunite their parents.

programme.title: We're the Millers
programme.desc: Small-time pot dealer David (Jason Sudeikis) learns the hard way that no good deed goes unpunished; trying to help some teens, he is jumped by thugs and loses his cash and stash. Now, David's in big debt to his supplier and -- to wipe the slate clean -- he must go to Mexico to pick up the guy's latest shipment. To accomplish his mission, Dave devises a foolproof plan: He packs a fake family into a huge RV and heads south of the border for a wild weekend that is sure to end with a bang.

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: Florida resident Diana (Melissa McCarthy) has a luxurious lifestyle as the queen of retail, buying whatever strikes her fancy -- and it's all free, thanks to Sandy Patterson (Jason Bateman), a guy from Denver whose identity she stole. With just one week to track down Diana before his world implodes, the real Sandy heads south to confront the unapologetic con artist and bring her back to Denver so that he can clear his name and restore his shattered credit rating.

programme.desc: The boys gamble away their money to a female card shark who takes a fancy to Carlton, making her boyfriend jealous.

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Brennan Huff (Will Ferrell) and Dale Doback (John C. Reilly) have one thing in common: they are both lazy, unemployed leeches who still live with their parents. When Brennan's mother and Dale's father marry and move in together, it turns the overgrown boys' world upside down. Their insane rivalry and narcissism pull the new family apart, forcing them to work together to reunite their parents.

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: Florida resident Diana (Melissa McCarthy) has a luxurious lifestyle as the queen of retail, buying whatever strikes her fancy -- and it's all free, thanks to Sandy Patterson (Jason Bateman), a guy from Denver whose identity she stole. With just one week to track down Diana before his world implodes, the real Sandy heads south to confront the unapologetic con artist and bring her back to Denver so that he can clear his name and restore his shattered credit rating.

programme.title: We're the Millers
programme.desc: Small-time pot dealer David (Jason Sudeikis) learns the hard way that no good deed goes unpunished; trying to help some teens, he is jumped by thugs and loses his cash and stash. Now, David's in big debt to his supplier and -- to wipe the slate clean -- he must go to Mexico to pick up the guy's latest shipment. To accomplish his mission, Dave devises a foolproof plan: He packs a fake family into a huge RV and heads south of the border for a wild weekend that is sure to end with a bang.

programme.title: World Poker Tour Programming
programme.desc: The World Poker Tour ignited the global poker boom with the creation of this unique television show based on a series of high-stakes tournaments, and has broadcast globally in over 150 countries and territories. Televised WPT events turned Gus Hansen into the Great Dane and Daniel Negreanu into Kid Poker, and created dozens of poker-made millionaires. World Poker Tour broadcasts Main Tour and WPT Alpha8 events throughout the world.
